  **âš¡ Quick Start Guide** {#quick-start}

     1 â”‚# Test the root endpoint
     2 â”‚curl http://35.232.77.162
     3 â”‚

     5 â”‚curl http://35.232.77.162/health
     6 â”‚

     8 â”‚curl -X GET http://35.232.77.162 | jq


  **2. Process Text with AI**


     1 â”‚# Main endpoint - process any text prompt
     2 â”‚curl -X POST http://35.232.77.162/process \
     3 â”‚  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     4 â”‚  -d '{
     5 â”‚    "prompt": "Analyze the economic implications of decentralized AI systems",
     6 â”‚    "llm_provider": "gemini",
     7 â”‚    "context": "research_analysis"
     8 â”‚  }'


  **3. Create AI Agents**


     1 â”‚# Create a GLAC agent
     2 â”‚curl -X POST http://35.232.77.162/agents \
     3 â”‚  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     4 â”‚  -d '{
     5 â”‚    "agent_type": "GLAC",
     6 â”‚    "parameters": {
     7 â”‚      "strategy": "positive",
     8 â”‚      "learning_rate": 0.01
     9 â”‚    }
    10 â”‚  }'
    11 â”‚
    12 â”‚# List all agents
    13 â”‚curl http://35.232.77.162/agents

     2 â”‚  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     3 â”‚  -d '{
     4 â”‚    "strategy": "strategic_planning",
     5 â”‚    "focus": "competitive_analysis",
     6 â”‚    "specialization": "market_positioning"
     7 â”‚  }'


  **ğŸ” Risk Assessment Agent (GLAC):**


     1 â”‚curl -X POST "http://35.232.77.162/agents/create?agent_type=GLAC" \
     2 â”‚  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \

  **ğŸš€ Innovation Analysis Agent (TSGLA):**


     1 â”‚curl -X POST "http://35.232.77.162/agents/create?agent_type=TSGLA" \
     2 â”‚  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \

  **ğŸ“ˆ Check Your Created Agents:**


     1 â”‚# List all agents
     2 â”‚curl http://35.232.77.162/agents
     3 â”‚
     4 â”‚# Get specific agent details (replace with actual agent_id)
     5 â”‚curl http://35.232.77.162/agents/GLAC_0_4158


  **ğŸ® PYTHON VERSION FOR MULTIPLE AGENTS:**


     1 â”‚import requests
     2 â”‚
     3 â”‚# Create multiple agents at once
     4 â”‚agent_configs = [
     5 â”‚    {
     6 â”‚        "agent_type": "GLAC",
     7 â”‚        "name": "Economic Optimizer",
     8 â”‚        "params": {"strategy": "economic_optimization", "focus": "financial_modeling"}
     9 â”‚    },
    10 â”‚    {
    11 â”‚        "agent_type": "TSGLA", 
    12 â”‚        "name": "Tech Analyst",
    13 â”‚        "params": {"strategy": "technical_analysis", "focus": "technology_assessment"}
    14 â”‚    },
    15 â”‚    {
    16 â”‚        "agent_type": "TASA-NS-Alg",
    17 â”‚        "name": "Strategy Planner", 
    18 â”‚        "params": {"strategy": "strategic_planning", "focus": "competitive_analysis"}
    19 â”‚    }
    20 â”‚]
    21 â”‚
    22 â”‚created_agents = []
    23 â”‚base_url = "http://35.232.77.162"
    24 â”‚
    25 â”‚for config in agent_configs:
    26 â”‚    response = requests.post(
    27 â”‚        f"{base_url}/agents/create?agent_type={config['agent_type']}", 
    28 â”‚        json=config["params"]
    29 â”‚    )
    30 â”‚    
    31 â”‚    if response.status_code == 200:
    32 â”‚        agent = response.json()
    33 â”‚        created_agents.append(agent)
    34 â”‚        print(f"âœ… Created {config['name']}: {agent['agent_id']}")
    35 â”‚    else:
    36 â”‚        print(f"âŒ Failed to create {config['name']}: {response.status_code}")
    37 â”‚
    38 â”‚print(f"\nğŸ¯ Successfully created {len(created_agents)} agents!")
    39 â”‚
    40 â”‚# List all agents
    41 â”‚agents_list = requests.get(f"{base_url}/agents").json()
    42 â”‚print(f"ğŸ“Š Total agents in system: {agents_list['count']}")


  **âš¡ QUICK TEST - CREATE 3 AGENTS RIGHT NOW:**

  Just copy and paste these three commands:

     1 â”‚curl -X POST "http://35.232.77.162/agents/create?agent_type=GLAC" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"strategy": 
       â”‚"economic_optimization"}'
     2 â”‚
     3 â”‚curl -X POST "http://35.232.77.162/agents/create?agent_type=TSGLA" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"strategy": 
       â”‚"technical_analysis"}'
     4 â”‚
     5 â”‚curl -X POST "http://35.232.77.162/agents/create?agent_type=TASA-NS-Alg" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d '{"strategy":
       â”‚ "strategic_planning"}'

  Then check what you created:

  curl http://35.232.77.162/agents


  **ğŸ¯ EXPECTED RESPONSE:**


     1 â”‚{
     2 â”‚  "agent_id": "GLAC_X_XXXX",
     3 â”‚  "type": "GLAC", 
     4 â”‚  "status": "created",
     5 â”‚  "message": "Agent GLAC_X_XXXX created with full capabilities"
     6 â”‚}

  ğŸš€ Yes! You can absolutely just copy-paste these commands to create agents on your live production system! ğŸ‰

 â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”

 â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜

 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ âœ… What Your MAS System Already Has:                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚ â€¢ Multiple LLM providers (9 available: Gemini, Anthropic, OpenAI, etc.)                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ â€¢ Asynchronous processing with simulation tracking                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ â€¢ JSON-structured output with financial projections, market analysis, risk assessment                                       â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ ğŸ” What Needs Enhancement:                                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚ **2.1 Enhanced API Endpoints (New)**                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    1 â”‚# Add to aia_system/api/full_api.py                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    2 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    3 â”‚@app.post("/reports/structured")                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚    6 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
