 â”‚ â”‚    8 â”‚async def generate_slide_deck(request: SlideDeckRequest):                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    9 â”‚    """Generate presentation slides from analysis data"""                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   10 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   11 â”‚@app.get("/reports/{report_id}/schema")                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   12 â”‚async def get_report_schema(report_id: str):                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   13 â”‚    """Get the JSON-LD schema for a generated report"""                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   14 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   15 â”‚@app.post("/analysis/competitive")                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   16 â”‚async def competitive_analysis(request: CompetitiveAnalysisRequest):                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   17 â”‚    """Specialized competitive landscape analysis"""                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   18 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   19 â”‚@app.post("/analysis/customer")                                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   20 â”‚async def customer_analysis(request: CustomerAnalysisRequest):                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   21 â”‚    """Detailed customer segmentation and behavior analysis"""                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **2.2 Schema Implementation (New)**                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    1 â”‚# Create: aia_system/schemas/report_schemas.py                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    2 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    3 â”‚from pydantic import BaseModel                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    4 â”‚from typing import List, Dict, Any, Optional                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    5 â”‚from datetime import datetime                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    6 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    7 â”‚class TableSchema(BaseModel):                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    8 â”‚    name: str                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    9 â”‚    description: str                                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   10 â”‚    columns: List[str]                                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   11 â”‚    rows: List[Dict[str, Any]]                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   12 â”‚    csvSchema: str                                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   13 â”‚    analysis: str                                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   14 â”‚    dashboard: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   15 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   16 â”‚class ChapterSchema(BaseModel):                                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   17 â”‚    type: str = "Chapter"                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   18 â”‚    name: str                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   19 â”‚    description: Optional[str] = None                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   20 â”‚    hasPart: List[Any]  # Can contain Reports, Tables, or other Chapters                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   21 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   22 â”‚class StructuredReport(BaseModel):                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   23 â”‚    context: str = "https://schema.org"                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   24 â”‚    type: str = "Report"                                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   25 â”‚    name: str                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   26 â”‚    dateCreated: datetime                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   27 â”‚    description: str                                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   28 â”‚    creator: Dict[str, str]                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   29 â”‚    hasPart: List[ChapterSchema]                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   30 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   31 â”‚class VisualizationSpec(BaseModel):                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   32 â”‚    type: str                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   33 â”‚    title: str                                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   34 â”‚    data_source: str                                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   35 â”‚    x_axis: Optional[str] = None                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   36 â”‚    y_axis: Optional[str] = None                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   37 â”‚    color: Optional[str] = None                                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   38 â”‚    description: Optional[str] = None                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   39 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   40 â”‚class DashboardSchema(BaseModel):                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   41 â”‚    type: str = "Dashboard"                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   42 â”‚    name: str                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   43 â”‚    visualizations: List[VisualizationSpec]                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **2.3 Report Generator Engine (New)**                                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    1 â”‚# Create: aia_system/core/structured_report_generator.py                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    2 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    3 â”‚class StructuredReportGenerator:                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    4 â”‚    def __init__(self, mas_client):                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    5 â”‚        self.mas_client = mas_client                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    6 â”‚        self.schema_templates = self._load_schema_templates()                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    7 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    8 â”‚    def generate_market_analysis_report(self, prompt: str, market_focus: str) -> StructuredReport:                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    9 â”‚        """Generate comprehensive market analysis following schema"""                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   10 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   11 â”‚        # 1. Multi-agent analysis for different report sections                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   12 â”‚        analyses = {                                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   13 â”‚            "executive_summary": self._generate_executive_summary(prompt),                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   14 â”‚            "market_analysis": self._generate_market_analysis(prompt, market_focus),                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   15 â”‚            "customer_analysis": self._generate_customer_analysis(prompt),                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   16 â”‚            "competitive_analysis": self._generate_competitive_analysis(prompt),                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   17 â”‚            "future_outlook": self._generate_future_outlook(prompt)                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   18 â”‚        }                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   19 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   20 â”‚        # 2. Structure into JSON-LD schema                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   21 â”‚        return self._compile_structured_report(analyses, market_focus)                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   22 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   23 â”‚    def _generate_market_analysis(self, prompt: str, focus: str) -> Dict:                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   24 â”‚        """Generate market analysis with tables and visualizations"""                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   25 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   26 â”‚        # Submit specialized market analysis                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   27 â”‚        market_prompt = f"""                                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   28 â”‚        Generate comprehensive market analysis for: {prompt}                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   29 â”‚        Focus area: {focus}                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   30 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   31 â”‚        Required components:                                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   32 â”‚        1. Overall market volume and value (2019-2029) with historical data and forecasts                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   33 â”‚        2. Market segmentation by product/service with CAGRs                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   34 â”‚        3. Geographic segmentation with regional growth rates                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   35 â”‚        4. Growth drivers with quantified impact (+X% annual contribution)                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   36 â”‚        5. Market inhibitors with risk probability and impact (-X% detraction)                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   37 â”‚        6. Market trends with quantified effects on segments                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   38 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   39 â”‚        Format as structured data with sources and dashboard specifications.                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   40 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   41 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   42 â”‚        # Process with specialized agents                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   43 â”‚        response = requests.post(f"{self.mas_client.base_url}/process", json={                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   44 â”‚            "prompt": market_prompt,                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   45 â”‚            "llm_provider": "anthropic",  # Use Anthropic for detailed analysis                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   46 â”‚            "context": "market_analysis_structured"                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   47 â”‚        })                                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   48 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   49 â”‚        # Wait for completion and get results                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   50 â”‚        sim_id = response.json()["simulation_id"]                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   51 â”‚        return self._get_analysis_results(sim_id)                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   52 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   53 â”‚    def _generate_tables_with_csvschema(self, data: Dict, table_type: str) -> List[TableSchema]:                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   54 â”‚        """Convert analysis data into structured tables with CSV schemas"""                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   55 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   56 â”‚        tables = []                                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   57 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   58 â”‚        if table_type == "market_volume_value":                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   59 â”‚            # Generate market volume & value table                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   60 â”‚            table = TableSchema(                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   61 â”‚                name="Overall Market Volume & Value (Historical & Forecast)",                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   62 â”‚                description="Historical and forecast data for market volume and value with CAGRs",                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   63 â”‚                columns=["Year", "Market Volume (Units/Users Bn)", "Market Value (~â‚¬Bn)", "Value CAGR (vs. prior 5    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚      â”‚yrs)", "Source(s)"],                                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   64 â”‚                rows=self._extract_market_data_rows(data),                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   65 â”‚                csvSchema=self._generate_csv_schema(["Year", "Market Volume", "Market Value", "CAGR", "Sources"]),    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   66 â”‚                analysis=self._generate_table_analysis(data, "market_growth"),                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   67 â”‚                dashboard={                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   68 â”‚                    "type": "Dashboard",                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   69 â”‚                    "name": "Market Volume and Value Over Time",                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   70 â”‚                    "visualizations": [                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   71 â”‚                        {"type": "LineChart", "title": "Market Value Historical vs. Forecast", "x_axis": "Year",      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚      â”‚"y_axis": "Market Value (~â‚¬Bn)"},                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   72 â”‚                        {"type": "BarChart", "title": "Market Volume by Segment (2024)", "x_axis": "Segment Name",    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚      â”‚"y_axis": "Est. 2024 Value (~â‚¬Bn)"}                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   73 â”‚                    ]                                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   74 â”‚                }                                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   75 â”‚            )                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   76 â”‚            tables.append(table)                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   77 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   78 â”‚        return tables                                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   79 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   80 â”‚    def _compile_structured_report(self, analyses: Dict, market_focus: str) -> StructuredReport:                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   81 â”‚        """Compile all analyses into final structured report"""                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   82 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   83 â”‚        # Create chapters following the schema                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   84 â”‚        chapters = [                                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   85 â”‚            ChapterSchema(                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   86 â”‚                name="Executive Summary",                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   87 â”‚                hasPart=[{                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   88 â”‚                    "type": "Report",                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   89 â”‚                    "name": "Executive Summary",                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   90 â”‚                    "description": "Synthesizes key findings with quantified insights",                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   91 â”‚                    "content": analyses["executive_summary"]                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   92 â”‚                }]                                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   93 â”‚            ),                                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   94 â”‚            ChapterSchema(                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   95 â”‚                name="Market Analysis â€“ Size, Growth, Trends",                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   96 â”‚                hasPart=[                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   97 â”‚                    analyses["market_analysis"]["tables"],                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   98 â”‚                    analyses["market_analysis"]["reports"]                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   99 â”‚                ]                                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  100 â”‚            ),                                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  101 â”‚            ChapterSchema(                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  102 â”‚                name="Customer Analysis",                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  103 â”‚                hasPart=analyses["customer_analysis"]["components"]                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  104 â”‚            ),                                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  105 â”‚            ChapterSchema(                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  106 â”‚                name="Competitive Analysis",                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  107 â”‚                hasPart=analyses["competitive_analysis"]["components"]                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  108 â”‚            ),                                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  109 â”‚            ChapterSchema(                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  110 â”‚                name="Future Outlook and Synthesis for Investors",                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  111 â”‚                hasPart=analyses["future_outlook"]["components"]                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  112 â”‚            )                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  113 â”‚        ]                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  114 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  115 â”‚        return StructuredReport(                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  116 â”‚            name=f"Market Analysis Report for {market_focus}",                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  117 â”‚            dateCreated=datetime.now(),                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  118 â”‚            description="Comprehensive, data-driven market analysis report for investors",                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  119 â”‚            creator={"type": "Organization", "name": "AI-Powered Research Agent"},                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  120 â”‚            hasPart=chapters                                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  121 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **2.4 Slide Deck Generator (New)**                                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    1 â”‚# Create: aia_system/core/slide_generator.py                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    2 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    3 â”‚class SlideDeckGenerator:                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    4 â”‚    def __init__(self, report_data: Dict):                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    5 â”‚        self.report_data = report_data                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    6 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    7 â”‚    def generate_investor_slides(self) -> Dict:                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    8 â”‚        """Generate investor presentation from structured report"""                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    9 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   10 â”‚        slides = []                                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   11 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   12 â”‚        # Title slide                                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   13 â”‚        slides.append({                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   14 â”‚            "type": "Slide",                                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   15 â”‚            "name": "Title Slide",                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   16 â”‚            "content": {                                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   17 â”‚                "title": f"Market Analysis: {self.report_data['market_focus']}",                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   18 â”‚                "subtitle": "Comprehensive Overview for Investors",                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   19 â”‚                "reference_date": datetime.now().strftime("%B %d, %Y")                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   20 â”‚            }                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   21 â”‚        })                                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   22 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   23 â”‚        # Executive summary slide                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   24 â”‚        exec_summary = self.report_data["executive_summary"]                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   25 â”‚        slides.append({                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   26 â”‚            "type": "Slide",                                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   27 â”‚            "name": "Executive Summary",                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   28 â”‚            "content": {                                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   29 â”‚                "title": "Executive Summary: Key Investor Insights",                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   30 â”‚                "key_takeaways": exec_summary.get("key_findings", []),                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   31 â”‚                "visualizations": [                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   32 â”‚                    {"type": "Chart", "chart_type": "LineChart", "title": "Market Value Forecast"},                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   33 â”‚                    {"type": "Chart", "chart_type": "BarChart", "title": "Key Segment Contributions"}                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   34 â”‚                ]                                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   35 â”‚            }                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   36 â”‚        })                                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   37 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   38 â”‚        # Market analysis slides                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   39 â”‚        market_data = self.report_data["market_analysis"]                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   40 â”‚        slides.extend(self._generate_market_slides(market_data))                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   41 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   42 â”‚        # Competitive analysis slides                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   43 â”‚        competitive_data = self.report_data["competitive_analysis"]                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   44 â”‚        slides.extend(self._generate_competitive_slides(competitive_data))                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   45 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   46 â”‚        return {                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   47 â”‚            "context": "https://schema.org",                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   48 â”‚            "type": "SlideDeck",                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   49 â”‚            "name": f"Market Analysis Slides: {self.report_data['market_focus']}",                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   50 â”‚            "description": "Presentation summarizing market analysis for investors",                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   51 â”‚            "hasPart": slides                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   52 â”‚        }                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **2.5 Enhanced Processing Pipeline (Enhancement)**                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    1 â”‚# Enhance: aia_system/api/full_api.py                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    2 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    3 â”‚async def process_structured_analysis(request: StructuredAnalysisRequest):                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    4 â”‚    """Enhanced processing with structured output generation"""                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    5 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    6 â”‚    # 1. Initial multi-agent analysis (existing)                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    7 â”‚    base_analysis = await process_text_prompt(request)                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    8 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    9 â”‚    # 2. Generate structured components                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   10 â”‚    if request.output_format == "structured_report":                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   11 â”‚        generator = StructuredReportGenerator(self)                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   12 â”‚        structured_report = generator.generate_market_analysis_report(                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   13 â”‚            request.prompt,                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   14 â”‚            request.market_focus                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   15 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   16 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   17 â”‚        # 3. Generate supplementary components                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   18 â”‚        if request.include_slides:                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   19 â”‚            slide_generator = SlideDeckGenerator(structured_report.dict())                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   20 â”‚            slides = slide_generator.generate_investor_slides()                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   21 â”‚            structured_report.slides = slides                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   22 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   23 â”‚        if request.include_dashboard:                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   24 â”‚            dashboard_generator = DashboardGenerator(structured_report.dict())                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   25 â”‚            dashboard = dashboard_generator.generate_interactive_dashboard()                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   26 â”‚            structured_report.dashboard = dashboard                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   27 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   28 â”‚        return structured_report                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   29 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   30 â”‚    return base_analysis                                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **Phase 3: Implementation Priority Matrix**                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **3.1 High Priority (Immediate Implementation):**                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ 1. Schema Compliance Engine - Convert existing JSON outputs to follow JSON-LD schemas                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ 2. Table Generation System - Structured data tables with CSV schemas and analysis                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ 3. Multi-Analysis Orchestration - Coordinate multiple specialized analyses per report section                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ 4. Source Attribution Framework - Track and cite data sources throughout analysis                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **3.2 Medium Priority (Next Sprint):**                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ 1. Slide Deck Generation - Convert structured reports to presentation format                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ 2. Dashboard Specification - Generate visualization metadata and specifications                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ 3. Competitive Analysis Module - Specialized competitive landscape analysis                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ 4. Customer Segmentation Engine - Detailed customer behavior and metrics analysis                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **3.3 Future Enhancement (Long-term):**                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ 1. Interactive 3D Dashboards - Full D3.js/Three.js visualization implementation                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ 2. Real-time Data Integration - Live market data feeds and updates                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ 3. Advanced Analytics - Geographic analysis, trend prediction, scenario modeling                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ 4. Export Capabilities - PDF, PowerPoint, Excel export with formatting                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **Phase 4: Implementation Steps**                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **4.1 Immediate Actions (Week 1):**                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ 1. Create Schema Models - Implement Pydantic models for all JSON-LD schemas                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ 2. Enhance /process Endpoint - Add structured output option with schema compliance                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ 3. Table Generation Module - Build table generator with CSV schema support                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ 4. Source Attribution System - Add source tracking to analysis pipeline                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **4.2 Integration Points (Week 2):**                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ 1. Multi-Agent Orchestration - Coordinate different agents for different report sections:                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   â€¢ Market Analysis: 30 TSGLA agents (time-series analysis)                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   â€¢ Competitive Analysis: 25 GLAC agents (game theory/competition)                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   â€¢ Customer Analysis: 20 TASA-NS-Alg agents (strategic/behavioral analysis)                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   â€¢ Risk Assessment: Mixed 40-agent ensemble                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ 2. Enhanced Processing Pipeline:                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    1 â”‚   # Enhanced request processing                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    2 â”‚   @app.post("/reports/comprehensive")                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    3 â”‚   async def generate_comprehensive_report(request: ComprehensiveReportRequest):                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    4 â”‚       # Coordinate multiple specialized analyses                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    5 â”‚       analyses = await asyncio.gather(                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    6 â”‚           process_market_analysis(request.prompt),                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    7 â”‚           process_competitive_analysis(request.prompt),                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    8 â”‚           process_customer_analysis(request.prompt),                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    9 â”‚           process_risk_assessment(request.prompt)                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   10 â”‚       )                                                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   11 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   12 â”‚       # Compile into structured schema                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   13 â”‚       return compile_structured_report(analyses, request.schema_type)                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **4.3 Code Examples for Implementation:**                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **Enhanced Agent Creation for Structured Analysis:**                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    1 â”‚# Create specialized analysis agents                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    2 â”‚curl -X POST "http://35.232.77.162/agents/create?agent_type=TSGLA" \                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    3 â”‚  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    4 â”‚  -d '{                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    5 â”‚    "strategy": "market_analysis",                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    6 â”‚    "focus": "historical_data_analysis",                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    7 â”‚    "specialization": "time_series_forecasting"                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    8 â”‚  }'                                                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    9 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   10 â”‚curl -X POST "http://35.232.77.162/agents/create?agent_type=GLAC" \                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   11 â”‚  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   12 â”‚  -d '{                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   13 â”‚    "strategy": "competitive_analysis",                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   14 â”‚    "focus": "market_positioning",                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   15 â”‚    "specialization": "strategic_assessment"                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   16 â”‚  }'                                                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   17 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   18 â”‚curl -X POST "http://35.232.77.162/agents/create?agent_type=TASA-NS-Alg" \                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   19 â”‚  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   20 â”‚  -d '{                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   21 â”‚    "strategy": "customer_segmentation",                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   22 â”‚    "focus": "behavioral_analysis",                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   23 â”‚    "specialization": "demographic_modeling"                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   24 â”‚  }'                                                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **Structured Report Generation:**                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    1 â”‚# Full implementation script                                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    2 â”‚import requests                                                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    3 â”‚import json                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    4 â”‚from datetime import datetime                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    5 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    6 â”‚class StructuredReportClient:                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    7 â”‚    def __init__(self, base_url="http://35.232.77.162"):                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    8 â”‚        self.base_url = base_url                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    9 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   10 â”‚    def generate_comprehensive_market_report(self,                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   11 â”‚                                           market_focus: str,                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   12 â”‚                                           company_focus: str = None,                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   13 â”‚                                           include_slides: bool = True,                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   14 â”‚                                           include_dashboard: bool = True):                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   15 â”‚        """Generate full structured report with all components"""                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   16 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   17 â”‚        # 1. Submit comprehensive analysis request                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   18 â”‚        request_payload = {                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   19 â”‚            "prompt": f"""                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   20 â”‚            Generate comprehensive structured market analysis report for: {market_focus}                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   21 â”‚            {f"Company focus: {company_focus}" if company_focus else ""}                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   22 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   23 â”‚            Required schema compliance:                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   24 â”‚            - JSON-LD structured format                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   25 â”‚            - Executive Summary with quantified insights                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   26 â”‚            - Market Analysis with historical data (2019-2029) and forecasts                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   27 â”‚            - Customer segmentation with behavioral analysis                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   28 â”‚            - Competitive landscape with detailed player analysis                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   29 â”‚            - Future outlook with investment thesis                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   30 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   31 â”‚            Include detailed tables with:                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   32 â”‚            - Market volume/value historical and forecast                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   33 â”‚            - Geographic segmentation with CAGRs                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   34 â”‚            - Growth drivers with quantified impact                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   35 â”‚            - Risk assessment with probability scoring                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   36 â”‚            - Customer metrics (ACV, CAC, LTV, churn rates)                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   37 â”‚            - Competitive benchmarking (revenue, margins, market share)                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   38 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   39 â”‚            Generate dashboard specifications for each data table.                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   40 â”‚            Include CSV schemas for all tabular data.                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   41 â”‚            Provide source attribution for all data points.                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   42 â”‚            """,                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   43 â”‚            "llm_provider": "anthropic",                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   44 â”‚            "context": "structured_investment_analysis",                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   45 â”‚            "output_format": "structured_report",                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   46 â”‚            "include_slides": include_slides,                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   47 â”‚            "include_dashboard": include_dashboard                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   48 â”‚        }                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   49 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   50 â”‚        # 2. Process with multiple agent types                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   51 â”‚        response = requests.post(f"{self.base_url}/reports/comprehensive",                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   52 â”‚                               json=request_payload)                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   53 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   54 â”‚        if response.status_code != 200:                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   55 â”‚            # Fallback to current system                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   56 â”‚            return self._fallback_structured_generation(request_payload)                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   57 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   58 â”‚        return response.json()                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   59 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   60 â”‚    def _fallback_structured_generation(self, request_payload):                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   61 â”‚        """Fallback using current /process endpoint with post-processing"""                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   62 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   63 â”‚        # Use current system and post-process into structure                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   64 â”‚        response = requests.post(f"{self.base_url}/process",                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   65 â”‚                               json=request_payload)                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   66 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   67 â”‚        sim_id = response.json()["simulation_id"]                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   68 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   69 â”‚        # Wait for completion                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   70 â”‚        import time                                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   71 â”‚        while True:                                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   72 â”‚            status = requests.get(f"{self.base_url}/simulations/{sim_id}")                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   73 â”‚            if status.json().get("status") == "completed":                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   74 â”‚                break                                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   75 â”‚            time.sleep(3)                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   76 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   77 â”‚        # Get results and structure them                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   78 â”‚        results = requests.get(f"{self.base_url}/simulations/{sim_id}/results").json()                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   79 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   80 â”‚        return self._convert_to_structured_format(results)                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   81 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   82 â”‚    def _convert_to_structured_format(self, mas_results: Dict) -> Dict:                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   83 â”‚        """Convert current MAS output to structured schema format"""                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   84 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   85 â”‚        structured = {                                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   86 â”‚            "@context": "https://schema.org",                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   87 â”‚            "@type": "Report",                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   88 â”‚            "name": "Market Analysis Report",                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   89 â”‚            "dateCreated": datetime.now().isoformat(),                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   90 â”‚            "creator": {"@type": "Organization", "name": "AI-Powered Research Agent"},                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   91 â”‚            "hasPart": []                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   92 â”‚        }                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   93 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   94 â”‚        # Executive Summary Chapter                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   95 â”‚        exec_chapter = {                                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   96 â”‚            "@type": "Chapter",                                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   97 â”‚            "name": "Executive Summary",                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   98 â”‚            "hasPart": {                                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   99 â”‚                "@type": "Report",                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  100 â”‚                "name": "Executive Summary",                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  101 â”‚                "content": mas_results.get("executive_summary", {}),                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  102 â”‚                "key_findings": mas_results.get("executive_summary", {}).get("key_findings", []),                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  103 â”‚                "investment_thesis": mas_results.get("executive_summary", {}).get("investment_thesis", ""),           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  104 â”‚                "recommendation": mas_results.get("executive_summary", {}).get("recommendation", ""),                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  105 â”‚                "confidence": mas_results.get("executive_summary", {}).get("confidence", 0.0)                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  106 â”‚            }                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  107 â”‚        }                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  108 â”‚        structured["hasPart"].append(exec_chapter)                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  109 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  110 â”‚        # Market Analysis Chapter with Tables                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  111 â”‚        if "market_analysis" in mas_results:                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  112 â”‚            market_data = mas_results["market_analysis"]                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  113 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  114 â”‚            # Generate market volume/value table                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  115 â”‚            market_table = {                                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  116 â”‚                "@type": "Table",                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  117 â”‚                "name": "Market Volume & Value Analysis",                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  118 â”‚                "description": "Market size analysis with growth projections",                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  119 â”‚                "columns": ["Segment", "2024 Value (â‚¬Bn)", "2029 Forecast (â‚¬Bn)", "CAGR (%)", "Source"],              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  120 â”‚                "rows": self._extract_segment_rows(market_data.get("segments", {})),                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  121 â”‚                "csvSchema": "Segment,2024 Value (â‚¬Bn),2029 Forecast (â‚¬Bn),CAGR (%),Source",                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  122 â”‚                "analysis": f"Market shows strong growth across segments. {market_data.get('analysis_summary',        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚      â”‚'')}",                                                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  123 â”‚                "dashboard": {                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  124 â”‚                    "@type": "Dashboard",                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  125 â”‚                    "name": "Market Segment Analysis",                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  126 â”‚                    "visualizations": [                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  127 â”‚                        {"@type": "BarChart", "title": "Segment Value Comparison", "x_axis": "Segment", "y_axis":     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚      â”‚"Value (â‚¬Bn)"},                                                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  128 â”‚                        {"@type": "LineChart", "title": "Growth Trajectory", "x_axis": "Year", "y_axis": "Market      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚      â”‚Value"}                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  129 â”‚                    ]                                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  130 â”‚                }                                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  131 â”‚            }                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  132 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  133 â”‚            market_chapter = {                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  134 â”‚                "@type": "Chapter",                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  135 â”‚                "name": "Market Analysis â€“ Size, Growth, Trends",                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  136 â”‚                "hasPart": [market_table]                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  137 â”‚            }                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  138 â”‚            structured["hasPart"].append(market_chapter)                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  139 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  140 â”‚        # Add other chapters...                                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  141 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  142 â”‚        return structured                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  143 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  144 â”‚# Usage Example                                                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  145 â”‚client = StructuredReportClient()                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  146 â”‚report = client.generate_comprehensive_market_report(                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  147 â”‚    market_focus="Multi-Agent AI Systems for German Startups",                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  148 â”‚    company_focus="1-man startup ecosystem",                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  149 â”‚    include_slides=True,                                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  150 â”‚    include_dashboard=True                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  151 â”‚)                                                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  152 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  153 â”‚# Save structured report                                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  154 â”‚with open("structured_investment_report.json", "w") as f:                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  155 â”‚    json.dump(report, f, indent=2)                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **Phase 5: Value-Added Enhancements**                                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **5.1 Advanced Features Beyond Current System:**                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ 1. Multi-Dimensional Analysis:                                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   â€¢ Geographic heat maps with market penetration data                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   â€¢ Customer journey analysis with touchpoint optimization                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   â€¢ Technology adoption lifecycle modeling                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ 2. Predictive Analytics:                                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
