 â”‚ â”‚   64 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   65 â”‚    def select_optimal_model(self, capability: str, context: Dict) -> str:                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   66 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   67 â”‚        Select optimal AI model based on context and requirements                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   68 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   69 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   70 â”‚        available_models = self.model_registry.get(capability, {})                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   71 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   72 â”‚        # Decision factors                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   73 â”‚        latency_requirement = context.get("max_latency_ms", 5000)                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   74 â”‚        cost_sensitivity = context.get("cost_sensitivity", "medium")                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   75 â”‚        quality_requirement = context.get("min_quality_score", 0.85)                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   76 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   77 â”‚        # Score each model                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   78 â”‚        model_scores = {}                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   79 â”‚        for model_tier, config in available_models.items():                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   80 â”‚            score = 0                                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   81 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   82 â”‚            # Latency scoring                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   83 â”‚            if config["latency_p95"] <= f"{latency_requirement}ms":                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   84 â”‚                score += 0.4                                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   85 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   86 â”‚            # Cost scoring                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   87 â”‚            if cost_sensitivity == "low" or config.get("cost_per_1k_tokens", 0) < 0.01:                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   88 â”‚                score += 0.3                                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   89 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   90 â”‚            # Quality scoring                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   91 â”‚            quality = config.get("quality_score", config.get("accuracy", 0))                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   92 â”‚            if quality >= quality_requirement:                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   93 â”‚                score += 0.3                                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   94 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   95 â”‚            model_scores[model_tier] = score                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   96 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   97 â”‚        # Select highest scoring model                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   98 â”‚        optimal_tier = max(model_scores, key=model_scores.get)                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   99 â”‚        return available_models[optimal_tier]["model"]                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **Phase 4: Advanced Feature Implementation**                                                                                â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚ **4.1 Immersive 3D Analytics Implementation**                                                                               â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚    3 â”‚    private scene: BABYLON.Scene;                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚    6 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    7 â”‚    constructor(canvas: HTMLCanvasElement) {                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    8 â”‚        this.engine = new BABYLON.Engine(canvas, true);                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    9 â”‚        this.scene = new BABYLON.Scene(this.engine);                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   10 â”‚        this.initializeXR();                                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   11 â”‚    }                                                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   12 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   13 â”‚    async initializeXR() {                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   14 â”‚        // WebXR setup for AR/VR support                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   15 â”‚        this.xrHelper = await this.scene.createDefaultXRExperienceAsync({                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   16 â”‚            floorMeshes: []                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   17 â”‚        });                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   18 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   19 â”‚        // Enhanced lighting for professional visualization                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   20 â”‚        const light = new BABYLON.HemisphericLight("hemi", new BABYLON.Vector3(0, 1, 0), this.scene);                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   21 â”‚        light.intensity = 0.6;                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   22 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   23 â”‚        // PBR materials for realistic rendering                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   24 â”‚        const pbrMaterial = new BABYLON.PBRMaterial("pbrMaterial", this.scene);                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   25 â”‚        pbrMaterial.baseColor = new BABYLON.Color3(0.2, 0.6, 1.0);                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   26 â”‚        pbrMaterial.metallicFactor = 0.0;                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   27 â”‚        pbrMaterial.roughnessFactor = 0.1;                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   28 â”‚    }                                                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   29 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   30 â”‚    createDataVisualization(reportData: StructuredReport): BABYLON.Mesh[] {                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   31 â”‚        const visualizations = [];                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   32 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   33 â”‚        // Create 3D representations of report chapters                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   34 â”‚        reportData.hasPart.forEach((chapter, index) => {                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   35 â”‚            const chapterMesh = this.createChapterVisualization(chapter, index);                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   36 â”‚            visualizations.push(chapterMesh);                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   37 â”‚        });                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   38 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   39 â”‚        // Create interactive connections between related data                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   40 â”‚        this.createDataRelationships(visualizations, reportData);                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   41 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   42 â”‚        return visualizations;                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   43 â”‚    }                                                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   44 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   45 â”‚    private createChapterVisualization(chapter: ChapterSchema, position: number): BABYLON.Mesh {                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   46 â”‚        // Create 3D representation of chapter data                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   47 â”‚        const geometry = BABYLON.MeshBuilder.CreateBox(`chapter_${position}`, {                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   48 â”‚            size: 2 + chapter.hasPart.length * 0.5                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   49 â”‚        }, this.scene);                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   50 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   51 â”‚        // Apply data-driven materials and animations                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   52 â”‚        this.applyDataDrivenStyling(geometry, chapter);                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   53 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   54 â”‚        // Add interactivity                                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   55 â”‚        geometry.actionManager = new BABYLON.ActionManager(this.scene);                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   56 â”‚        geometry.actionManager.registerAction(                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   57 â”‚            new BABYLON.ExecuteCodeAction(                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   58 â”‚                BABYLON.ActionManager.OnPickTrigger,                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   59 â”‚                () => this.onChapterInteraction(chapter)                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   60 â”‚            )                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   61 â”‚        );                                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   62 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   63 â”‚        return geometry;                                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   64 â”‚    }                                                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   65 â”‚}                                                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **4.2 Real-Time Collaboration Implementation**                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ WebSockets + Reflex Integration:                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    1 â”‚class RealTimeCollaborationEngine:                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    2 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    3 â”‚    Real-time collaboration engine using WebSockets and state synchronization                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    4 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    5 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    6 â”‚    def __init__(self, redis_client):                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    7 â”‚        self.redis = redis_client                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    8 â”‚        self.active_sessions = {}                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    9 â”‚        self.collaboration_state = CollaborationState()                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   10 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   11 â”‚    async def handle_collaborative_analysis(self, session_id: str,                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   12 â”‚                                          user_prompt: str,                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   13 â”‚                                          collaboration_context: Dict) -> Dict:                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   14 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   15 â”‚        Handle collaborative analysis requests with real-time updates                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   16 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   17 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   18 â”‚        # Initialize or join collaboration session                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   19 â”‚        session = await self.get_or_create_session(session_id)                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   20 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   21 â”‚        # Distribute analysis across multiple agents with real-time updates                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   22 â”‚        analysis_tasks = self._decompose_analysis_task(user_prompt)                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   23 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   24 â”‚        results = {}                                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   25 â”‚        for task_id, task in analysis_tasks.items():                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   26 â”‚            # Assign task to specialized agents                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   27 â”‚            assigned_agents = self._assign_agents_to_task(task)                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   28 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   29 â”‚            # Execute with real-time progress updates                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   30 â”‚            task_result = await self._execute_collaborative_task(                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   31 â”‚                task, assigned_agents, session_id                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   32 â”‚            )                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   33 â”‚            results[task_id] = task_result                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   34 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   35 â”‚            # Broadcast progress to all session participants                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   36 â”‚            await self._broadcast_progress_update(session_id, {                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   37 â”‚                "task_id": task_id,                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   38 â”‚                "status": "completed",                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   39 â”‚                "result": task_result                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   40 â”‚            })                                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   41 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   42 â”‚        # Synthesize final collaborative result                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   43 â”‚        final_result = await self._synthesize_collaborative_results(results)                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   44 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   45 â”‚        # Update session state                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   46 â”‚        session.add_result(final_result)                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   47 â”‚        await self._persist_session_state(session)                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   48 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   49 â”‚        return final_result                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   50 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   51 â”‚    async def _execute_collaborative_task(self, task: Dict,                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   52 â”‚                                        agents: List[str],                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   53 â”‚                                        session_id: str) -> Dict:                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   54 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   55 â”‚        Execute task with real-time collaboration features                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   56 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   57 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   58 â”‚        # Create agent collaboration network                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   59 â”‚        collaboration_network = self._create_agent_network(agents)                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   60 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   61 â”‚        # Execute agents in coordinated fashion                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   62 â”‚        agent_results = {}                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   63 â”‚        for agent_id in agents:                                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   64 â”‚            # Execute agent with collaboration context                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   65 â”‚            agent_result = await self._execute_agent_with_collaboration(                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   66 â”‚                agent_id, task, collaboration_network, session_id                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   67 â”‚            )                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   68 â”‚            agent_results[agent_id] = agent_result                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   69 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   70 â”‚            # Real-time broadcast of individual agent progress                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   71 â”‚            await self._broadcast_agent_progress(session_id, agent_id, agent_result)                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   72 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   73 â”‚        # Collaborative consensus building                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   74 â”‚        consensus_result = await self._build_agent_consensus(agent_results)                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   75 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   76 â”‚        return consensus_result                                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **4.3 Advanced Performance Optimization**                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ Python 3.13 Free-Threading Integration:                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    1 â”‚class OptimizedMASProcessor:                                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    2 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    3 â”‚    Leveraged Python 3.13 free-threading for parallel agent execution                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    4 â”‚    Addresses PY313-PERF-001 from known pitfalls                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    5 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    6 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    7 â”‚    def __init__(self, max_workers: int = 50):                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    8 â”‚        self.max_workers = max_workers                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    9 â”‚        self.thread_pool = ThreadPoolExecutor(max_workers=max_workers)                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   10 â”‚        self.agent_lock_manager = AgentLockManager()                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   11 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   12 â”‚    async def execute_parallel_agent_analysis(self,                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   13 â”‚                                            agent_tasks: List[AgentTask]) -> List[AgentResult]:                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   14 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   15 â”‚        Execute agent tasks in parallel using Python 3.13 free-threading                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   16 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   17 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   18 â”‚        # Optimize for GIL-free execution                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   19 â”‚        futures = []                                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   20 â”‚        for task in agent_tasks:                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   21 â”‚            # Submit to thread pool without GIL contention                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   22 â”‚            future = self.thread_pool.submit(                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   23 â”‚                self._execute_agent_task_optimized, task                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   24 â”‚            )                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   25 â”‚            futures.append(future)                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   26 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   27 â”‚        # Collect results with timeout                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   28 â”‚        results = []                                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   29 â”‚        for future in concurrent.futures.as_completed(futures, timeout=300):                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   30 â”‚            try:                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   31 â”‚                result = future.result()                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   32 â”‚                results.append(result)                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   33 â”‚            except Exception as e:                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   34 â”‚                self.logger.error(f"Agent task failed: {e}")                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   35 â”‚                continue                                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   36 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   37 â”‚        return results                                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   38 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   39 â”‚    def _execute_agent_task_optimized(self, task: AgentTask) -> AgentResult:                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   40 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   41 â”‚        Optimized agent execution leveraging free-threading                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   42 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   43 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   44 â”‚        # No GIL contention - true parallelism                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   45 â”‚        with self.agent_lock_manager.get_agent_lock(task.agent_id):                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   46 â”‚            # Agent-specific resource management                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   47 â”‚            agent = self._get_agent(task.agent_id)                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   48 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   49 â”‚            # Execute with performance monitoring                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   50 â”‚            start_time = time.perf_counter()                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   51 â”‚            result = agent.execute_task(task)                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   52 â”‚            execution_time = time.perf_counter() - start_time                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   53 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   54 â”‚            # Performance metrics                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   55 â”‚            result.execution_metrics = {                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   56 â”‚                "execution_time": execution_time,                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   57 â”‚                "memory_usage": self._get_memory_usage(),                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   58 â”‚                "cpu_utilization": self._get_cpu_usage(),                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   59 â”‚                "thread_id": threading.current_thread().ident                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   60 â”‚            }                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   61 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   62 â”‚            return result                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **Phase 5: Security & Compliance Integration**                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **5.1 Enhanced Security Framework**                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ Zero-Trust Security Implementation:                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    1 â”‚class PlatformSecurityFramework:                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    2 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    3 â”‚    Comprehensive security framework addressing identified pitfalls                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    4 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    5 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    6 â”‚    def __init__(self):                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    7 â”‚        self.crypto_manager = EnhancedCryptographyManager()                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    8 â”‚        self.compliance_checker = GDPRComplianceChecker()                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    9 â”‚        self.audit_logger = SecurityAuditLogger()                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   10 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   11 â”‚    def validate_user_input(self, prompt: str, context: Dict) -> ValidationResult:                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   12 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   13 â”‚        Comprehensive input validation addressing SEC-INPUT-001                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   14 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   15 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   16 â”‚        validation_result = ValidationResult()                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   17 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   18 â”‚        # Input sanitization                                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   19 â”‚        sanitized_prompt = self._sanitize_input(prompt)                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   20 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   21 â”‚        # Injection attack detection                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   22 â”‚        injection_patterns = [                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   23 â”‚            r"(?i)(union|select|insert|update|delete|drop|exec|script)",                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   24 â”‚            r"(?i)(<script|javascript:|vbscript:|onload|onerror)",                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   25 â”‚            r"(?i)(\.\.\/|\.\.\\|\/etc\/|c:\\)"                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   26 â”‚        ]                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   27 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   28 â”‚        for pattern in injection_patterns:                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   29 â”‚            if re.search(pattern, prompt):                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   30 â”‚                validation_result.add_threat("SQL_INJECTION_ATTEMPT", pattern)                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   31 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   32 â”‚        # PII detection and GDPR compliance                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   33 â”‚        pii_detected = self._detect_pii(prompt)                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   34 â”‚        if pii_detected:                                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   35 â”‚            validation_result.add_compliance_issue("GDPR_PII_DETECTED", pii_detected)                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   36 â”‚            # Auto-anonymize if possible                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   37 â”‚            sanitized_prompt = self._anonymize_pii(sanitized_prompt, pii_detected)                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   38 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   39 â”‚        # Rate limiting and abuse prevention                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   40 â”‚        rate_limit_check = self._check_rate_limits(context.get("user_id"))                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   41 â”‚        validation_result.rate_limit_status = rate_limit_check                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   42 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   43 â”‚        validation_result.sanitized_input = sanitized_prompt                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   44 â”‚        validation_result.is_valid = len(validation_result.threats) == 0                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   45 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   46 â”‚        return validation_result                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   47 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   48 â”‚    def encrypt_sensitive_data(self, data: Dict) -> EncryptedData:                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   49 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   50 â”‚        Encrypt sensitive data addressing PRIV-DATA-001                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   51 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   52 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   53 â”‚        # Identify sensitive fields                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   54 â”‚        sensitive_fields = self._identify_sensitive_fields(data)                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   55 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   56 â”‚        # Apply field-level encryption                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   57 â”‚        encrypted_data = {}                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   58 â”‚        for field, value in data.items():                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   59 â”‚            if field in sensitive_fields:                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   60 â”‚                encrypted_data[field] = self.crypto_manager.encrypt_field(value)                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   61 â”‚            else:                                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   62 â”‚                encrypted_data[field] = value                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   63 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   64 â”‚        # Add encryption metadata                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   65 â”‚        encryption_metadata = {                                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   66 â”‚            "algorithm": "AES-256-GCM",                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   67 â”‚            "key_id": self.crypto_manager.get_current_key_id(),                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   68 â”‚            "timestamp": datetime.now().isoformat(),                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   69 â”‚            "fields_encrypted": list(sensitive_fields)                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   70 â”‚        }                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   71 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   72 â”‚        return EncryptedData(                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   73 â”‚            data=encrypted_data,                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   74 â”‚            metadata=encryption_metadata                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   75 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **5.2 GDPR Compliance Implementation**                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ Privacy-by-Design Framework:                                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    1 â”‚class GDPRComplianceEngine:                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    2 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    3 â”‚    Comprehensive GDPR compliance engine                                                                              â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚    5 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    6 â”‚    def __init__(self):                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    7 â”‚        self.data_lineage_tracker = DataLineageTracker()                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    8 â”‚        self.consent_manager = ConsentManager()                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    9 â”‚        self.data_minimization_engine = DataMinimizationEngine()                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   10 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   11 â”‚    def process_data_with_compliance(self, user_data: Dict,                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   12 â”‚                                   processing_purpose: str) -> ComplianceResult:                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   13 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   14 â”‚        Process user data with full GDPR compliance                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   15 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   16 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   17 â”‚        compliance_result = ComplianceResult()                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   18 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   19 â”‚        # 1. Legal basis verification                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   20 â”‚        legal_basis = self._verify_legal_basis(user_data, processing_purpose)                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   21 â”‚        compliance_result.legal_basis = legal_basis                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   22 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   23 â”‚        # 2. Consent verification (if required)                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   24 â”‚        if legal_basis == "consent":                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   25 â”‚            consent_valid = self.consent_manager.verify_consent(                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   26 â”‚                user_data.get("user_id"), processing_purpose                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   27 â”‚            )                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   28 â”‚            if not consent_valid:                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   29 â”‚                compliance_result.add_violation("INVALID_CONSENT")                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   30 â”‚                return compliance_result                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   31 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   32 â”‚        # 3. Data minimization                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   33 â”‚        minimized_data = self.data_minimization_engine.minimize_data(                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   34 â”‚            user_data, processing_purpose                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   35 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   36 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   37 â”‚        # 4. Data lineage tracking                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   38 â”‚        self.data_lineage_tracker.track_processing(                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   39 â”‚            data_id=user_data.get("data_id"),                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   40 â”‚            processing_purpose=processing_purpose,                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   41 â”‚            legal_basis=legal_basis,                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   42 â”‚            timestamp=datetime.now()                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   43 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   44 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   45 â”‚        # 5. Retention period enforcement                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   46 â”‚        retention_metadata = self._calculate_retention_period(processing_purpose)                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   47 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   48 â”‚        compliance_result.processed_data = minimized_data                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   49 â”‚        compliance_result.retention_metadata = retention_metadata                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   50 â”‚        compliance_result.is_compliant = len(compliance_result.violations) == 0                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   51 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   52 â”‚        return compliance_result                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   53 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   54 â”‚    def generate_data_protection_impact_assessment(self,                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   55 â”‚                                                  capability: str) -> DPIA:                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   56 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚   59 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   60 â”‚        dpia = DPIA(capability_name=capability)                                                                       â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚   62 â”‚        # Risk assessment                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚   11 â”‚    async def generate_comprehensive_test_suite(self,                                                                 â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚   19 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   20 â”‚        # 1. Unit test generation                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚   27 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚   32 â”‚        # 4. Security test generation                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   33 â”‚        security_tests = await self._generate_security_tests(capability)                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   34 â”‚        test_suite.security_tests = security_tests                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   35 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚   41 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   42 â”‚    async def _generate_unit_tests(self, implementation_details: Dict) -> List[UnitTest]:                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   43 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   44 â”‚        Generate unit tests using LLM code analysis                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   45 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   46 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   47 â”‚        prompt = f"""                                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   48 â”‚        Generate comprehensive unit tests for the following implementation:                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   49 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   50 â”‚        {json.dumps(implementation_details, indent=2)}                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   51 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   52 â”‚        Generate tests for:                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   53 â”‚        1. Happy path scenarios with valid inputs                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   54 â”‚        2. Edge cases with boundary conditions                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   55 â”‚        3. Error scenarios with invalid inputs                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   56 â”‚        4. Performance benchmarks                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   57 â”‚        5. Security validations                                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   58 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   59 â”‚        Format as pytest functions with assertions and mock data.                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   60 â”‚        Include parameterized tests for multiple scenarios.                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   61 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   62 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   63 â”‚        test_code = await self.llm.generate_response(prompt)                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   64 â”‚        return self._parse_unit_tests(test_code)                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   65 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   66 â”‚    async def validate_agent_performance(self, agent_results: List[AgentResult]) -> PerformanceReport:                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   67 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚   73 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   74 â”‚        {json.dumps([result.to_dict() for result in agent_results], indent=2)}                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   75 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   76 â”‚        Assess:                                                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   77 â”‚        1. Consensus quality and convergence                                                                          â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚   82 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   83 â”‚        Identify performance issues and optimization opportunities.                                                   â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚   85 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   86 â”‚        performance_analysis = await self.llm.generate_response(prompt)                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   87 â”‚        return PerformanceReport(                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   88 â”‚            analysis=performance_analysis,                                                                            â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚   90 â”‚            recommendations=self._extract_recommendations(performance_analysis)                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   91 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **6.2 Multi-Layered Quality Assurance**                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ Comprehensive Quality Framework:                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    1 â”‚class PlatformQualityAssurance:                                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    2 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    3 â”‚    Multi-layered quality assurance for the entire platform                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    4 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    5 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    6 â”‚    def __init__(self):                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    7 â”‚        self.quality_metrics = QualityMetrics()                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    8 â”‚        self.bias_detector = MLBiasDetector()  # Addresses ML-BIAS-001                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    9 â”‚        self.fairness_validator = FairnessValidator()                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   10 â”‚        self.performance_profiler = PerformanceProfiler()                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   11 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   12 â”‚    def validate_platform_capability(self, capability: str,                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   13 â”‚                                   test_results: Dict) -> QualityReport:                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   14 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   15 â”‚        Comprehensive quality validation for platform capabilities                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   16 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   17 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   18 â”‚        quality_report = QualityReport(capability_name=capability)                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   19 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   20 â”‚        # 1. Functional quality validation                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   21 â”‚        functional_quality = self._validate_functional_quality(test_results)                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   22 â”‚        quality_report.functional_quality = functional_quality                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   23 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   24 â”‚        # 2. Performance quality validation                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   25 â”‚        performance_quality = self._validate_performance_quality(test_results)                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   26 â”‚        quality_report.performance_quality = performance_quality                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   27 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   28 â”‚        # 3. Security quality validation                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   29 â”‚        security_quality = self._validate_security_quality(test_results)                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   30 â”‚        quality_report.security_quality = security_quality                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   31 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   32 â”‚        # 4. AI bias and fairness validation                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   33 â”‚        if self._is_ai_capability(capability):                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   34 â”‚            bias_validation = self.bias_detector.detect_bias(test_results)                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   35 â”‚            fairness_validation = self.fairness_validator.validate_fairness(test_results)                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   36 â”‚            quality_report.bias_assessment = bias_validation                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   37 â”‚            quality_report.fairness_assessment = fairness_validation                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   38 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   39 â”‚        # 5. User experience quality validation                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   40 â”‚        ux_quality = self._validate_ux_quality(test_results, capability)                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   41 â”‚        quality_report.ux_quality = ux_quality                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   42 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   43 â”‚        # 6. Overall quality score calculation                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   44 â”‚        quality_report.overall_score = self._calculate_overall_quality_score(quality_report)                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   45 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   46 â”‚        return quality_report                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   47 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   48 â”‚    def _validate_ai_model_quality(self, model_results: Dict) -> AIQualityReport:                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   49 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   50 â”‚        Specialized validation for AI model components                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   51 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   52 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   53 â”‚        ai_quality = AIQualityReport()                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   54 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   55 â”‚        # Model accuracy validation                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   56 â”‚        ai_quality.accuracy_metrics = self._validate_model_accuracy(model_results)                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   57 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   58 â”‚        # Bias detection (addressing ML-BIAS-001)                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   59 â”‚        bias_analysis = self.bias_detector.analyze_model_bias(model_results)                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   60 â”‚        ai_quality.bias_report = bias_analysis                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   61 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   62 â”‚        # Fairness assessment across demographic groups                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   63 â”‚        fairness_analysis = self.fairness_validator.assess_model_fairness(model_results)                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   64 â”‚        ai_quality.fairness_report = fairness_analysis                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   65 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   66 â”‚        # Robustness testing                                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   67 â”‚        robustness_analysis = self._test_model_robustness(model_results)                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   68 â”‚        ai_quality.robustness_report = robustness_analysis                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   69 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   70 â”‚        # Explainability assessment                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   71 â”‚        explainability_analysis = self._assess_model_explainability(model_results)                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   72 â”‚        ai_quality.explainability_report = explainability_analysis                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   73 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   74 â”‚        return ai_quality                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **7.1 GitOps Implementation with ArgoCD**                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ Automated Deployment Pipeline:                                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚    8 â”‚  project: mas-project                                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    9 â”‚  source:                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   10 â”‚    repoURL: https://github.com/your-org/mas-platform                                                                 â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚   11 â”‚    def measure_capability_value(self, capability: str,                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   12 â”‚                                usage_data: Dict,                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   13 â”‚                                business_metrics: Dict) -> ValueReport:                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   14 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
