 â”‚ â”‚   17 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   18 â”‚        value_report = ValueReport(capability_name=capability)                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   19 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   20 â”‚        # 1. Direct value metrics                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   21 â”‚        direct_value = self._calculate_direct_value(usage_data, business_metrics)                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   22 â”‚        value_report.direct_value = direct_value                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   23 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   24 â”‚        # 2. Indirect value metrics (productivity, efficiency gains)                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   25 â”‚        indirect_value = self._calculate_indirect_value(usage_data, capability)                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   26 â”‚        value_report.indirect_value = indirect_value                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   27 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   28 â”‚        # 3. User satisfaction and adoption metrics                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   29 â”‚        user_metrics = self.user_impact_analyzer.analyze_user_impact(usage_data)                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   30 â”‚        value_report.user_impact = user_metrics                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   31 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   32 â”‚        # 4. ROI calculation                                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   33 â”‚        investment_costs = self._calculate_investment_costs(capability)                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   34 â”‚        roi = self.roi_calculator.calculate_roi(                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   35 â”‚            benefits=direct_value + indirect_value,                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   36 â”‚            costs=investment_costs                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   37 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   38 â”‚        value_report.roi = roi                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   39 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   40 â”‚        # 5. Strategic value assessment                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   41 â”‚        strategic_value = self._assess_strategic_value(capability, business_metrics)                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   42 â”‚        value_report.strategic_value = strategic_value                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   43 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   44 â”‚        return value_report                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   45 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   46 â”‚    CAPABILITY_VALUE_TARGETS = {                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   47 â”‚        "structured_reporting": {                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚   43 â”‚            estimated_value_improvement=self._estimate_value_improvement(successful_optimizations),                   â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚   36 â”‚            ],                                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   37 â”‚            "bounded_context": "KnowledgeRepresentation",                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   38 â”‚            "event_topics": ["knowledge.updated", "skills.learned", "pitfalls.detected"]                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   39 â”‚        },                                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   40 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   41 â”‚        "economic_governor": {                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   42 â”‚            "services": [                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   43 â”‚                "consensus_service",         # ZK-SNARK validation                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   44 â”‚                "incentive_service",         # VWT reward calculation                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   45 â”‚                "token_service",            # VWT/CVT lifecycle management                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   46 â”‚                "socioeconomic_model_service", # Economic stabilization                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   47 â”‚                "governance_service"         # Voting mechanisms                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   48 â”‚            ],                                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   49 â”‚            "bounded_context": "EconomicIncentives",                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   50 â”‚            "event_topics": ["tokens.minted", "rewards.distributed", "votes.cast"]                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   51 â”‚        },                                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   52 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   53 â”‚        "analytics_capabilities": {                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   54 â”‚            "services": [                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   55 â”‚                "structured_reporting_service",  # Our existing implementation                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   56 â”‚                "immersive_analytics_service",   # 3D/WebXR capabilities                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   57 â”‚                "predictive_modeling_service",   # ML forecasting                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   58 â”‚                "collaboration_service"          # Real-time sync                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   59 â”‚            ],                                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   60 â”‚            "bounded_context": "AnalyticsAndInsights",                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   61 â”‚            "event_topics": ["reports.generated", "insights.discovered", "collaborations.initiated"]                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   62 â”‚        }                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   63 â”‚    }                                                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   64 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   65 â”‚    def __init__(self, existing_mas_system):                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   66 â”‚        self.mas_system = existing_mas_system                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   67 â”‚        self.event_bus = EventDrivenMessageBus()                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   68 â”‚        self.service_registry = AAMServiceRegistry()                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   69 â”‚        self.dkg_client = DynamicKnowledgeGraphClient()                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   70 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   71 â”‚    def transform_agents_to_aam(self) -> List[AAMService]:                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   72 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   73 â”‚        Transform existing GLAC, TSGLA, TASA-NS-Alg agents into AAM services                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   74 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   75 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   76 â”‚        aam_services = []                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   77 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   78 â”‚        for agent in self.mas_system.agents:                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   79 â”‚            # Create AAM service specification                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   80 â”‚            service_spec = AAMServiceSpec(                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   81 â”‚                service_name=f"agent-{agent.name.lower()}",                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   82 â”‚                agent_type=agent.__class__.__name__,                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   83 â”‚                bounded_context=self._determine_bounded_context(agent),                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   84 â”‚                capabilities=self._extract_agent_capabilities(agent),                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   85 â”‚                event_subscriptions=self._determine_event_subscriptions(agent),                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   86 â”‚                event_publications=self._determine_event_publications(agent)                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   87 â”‚            )                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   88 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   89 â”‚            # Create microservice container                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   90 â”‚            aam_service = AAMService(service_spec)                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   91 â”‚            aam_services.append(aam_service)                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   92 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   93 â”‚        return aam_services                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   94 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   95 â”‚    def _determine_bounded_context(self, agent) -> str:                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   96 â”‚        """Determine Domain-Driven Design bounded context for agent"""                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   97 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   98 â”‚        if "GLAC" in agent.__class__.__name__:                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   99 â”‚            return "StrategicAnalysis"                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  100 â”‚        elif "TSGLA" in agent.__class__.__name__:                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  101 â”‚            return "TemporalAnalysis"                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  102 â”‚        elif "TASA" in agent.__class__.__name__:                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  103 â”‚            return "AbstractReasoning"                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  104 â”‚        else:                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  105 â”‚            return "GeneralAnalysis"                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **1.2 Dynamic Knowledge Graph (DKG) Integration**                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ Knowledge-Driven Agent Enhancement:                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    1 â”‚class DynamicKnowledgeGraphIntegration:                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    2 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    3 â”‚    Integrate DKG as the central nervous system for all agent operations                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    4 â”‚    Agents query DKG for skills, tools, and context instead of hardcoding                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    5 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    6 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    7 â”‚    def __init__(self, neo4j_client, existing_mas_system):                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    8 â”‚        self.neo4j = neo4j_client                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    9 â”‚        self.mas_system = existing_mas_system                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   10 â”‚        self.skill_registry = SkillRegistry(neo4j_client)                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   11 â”‚        self.tool_registry = ToolRegistry(neo4j_client)                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   12 â”‚        self.strategy_registry = StrategyRegistry(neo4j_client)                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   13 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   14 â”‚    def enhance_agents_with_dkg(self):                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   15 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   16 â”‚        Enhance existing agents with DKG knowledge integration                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   17 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   18 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   19 â”‚        for agent in self.mas_system.agents:                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   20 â”‚            # Replace hardcoded capabilities with DKG queries                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   21 â”‚            agent.dkg_client = DKGAgentClient(self.neo4j, agent.name)                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   22 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   23 â”‚            # Dynamic skill discovery                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   24 â”‚            agent.discover_skills = lambda task_type: self._query_relevant_skills(task_type)                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   25 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   26 â”‚            # Dynamic tool access                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   27 â”‚            agent.discover_tools = lambda task_context: self._query_relevant_tools(task_context)                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   28 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   29 â”‚            # Dynamic strategy selection                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   30 â”‚            agent.select_strategy = lambda situation: self._query_optimal_strategy(situation)                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   31 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   32 â”‚            # Register agent capabilities in DKG                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   33 â”‚            self._register_agent_in_dkg(agent)                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   34 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   35 â”‚    def _query_relevant_skills(self, task_type: str) -> List[Skill]:                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   36 â”‚        """Query DKG for skills relevant to specific task type"""                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   37 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   38 â”‚        cypher_query = """                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   39 â”‚        MATCH (t:TaskType {name: $task_type})-[:REQUIRES_SKILL]->(s:Skill)                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   40 â”‚        MATCH (s)-[:USES_TOOL]->(tool:Tool)                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   41 â”‚        MATCH (s)-[:PART_OF_STRATEGY]->(strategy:Strategy)                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   42 â”‚        RETURN s, collect(tool) as tools, collect(strategy) as strategies                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   43 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   44 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   45 â”‚        result = self.neo4j.run(cypher_query, task_type=task_type)                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   46 â”‚        return [self._parse_skill_result(record) for record in result]                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   47 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   48 â”‚    def _register_agent_in_dkg(self, agent):                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   49 â”‚        """Register agent capabilities and relationships in DKG"""                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   50 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   51 â”‚        agent_data = {                                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   52 â”‚            "name": agent.name,                                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   53 â”‚            "type": agent.__class__.__name__,                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   54 â”‚            "capabilities": agent.capabilities,                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   55 â”‚            "specialization": getattr(agent, 'specialization', 'general'),                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   56 â”‚            "performance_history": getattr(agent, 'performance_history', [])                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   57 â”‚        }                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   58 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   59 â”‚        cypher_create = """                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   60 â”‚        CREATE (a:Agent {                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   61 â”‚            name: $name,                                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   62 â”‚            type: $type,                                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   63 â”‚            specialization: $specialization,                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   64 â”‚            created_at: datetime()                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   65 â”‚        })                                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   66 â”‚        WITH a                                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   67 â”‚        UNWIND $capabilities as capability                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   68 â”‚        MERGE (c:Capability {name: capability})                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   69 â”‚        CREATE (a)-[:HAS_CAPABILITY {proficiency: 0.8}]->(c)                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   70 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   71 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   72 â”‚        self.neo4j.run(cypher_create, **agent_data)                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   73 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   74 â”‚class SkillRegistry:                                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   75 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   76 â”‚    Microservice for managing skill definitions and relationships                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   77 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   78 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   79 â”‚    def __init__(self, neo4j_client):                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   80 â”‚        self.neo4j = neo4j_client                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   81 â”‚        self.skill_ontology = self._initialize_skill_ontology()                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   82 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   83 â”‚    def register_skill(self, skill_definition: Dict) -> SkillID:                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   84 â”‚        """Register new skill in the knowledge graph"""                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   85 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   86 â”‚        cypher_query = """                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   87 â”‚        CREATE (s:Skill {                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   88 â”‚            name: $name,                                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   89 â”‚            description: $description,                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   90 â”‚            difficulty_level: $difficulty_level,                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   91 â”‚            category: $category,                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   92 â”‚            created_at: datetime()                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   93 â”‚        })                                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   94 â”‚        WITH s                                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   95 â”‚        UNWIND $required_tools as tool_name                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   96 â”‚        MATCH (t:Tool {name: tool_name})                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   97 â”‚        CREATE (s)-[:REQUIRES_TOOL]->(t)                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   98 â”‚        WITH s                                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   99 â”‚        UNWIND $techniques as technique                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  100 â”‚        CREATE (s)-[:INCLUDES_TECHNIQUE {name: technique.name, proficiency_required: technique.level}]->(s)           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  101 â”‚        RETURN s.id as skill_id                                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  102 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  103 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  104 â”‚        result = self.neo4j.run(cypher_query, **skill_definition)                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  105 â”‚        return result.single()["skill_id"]                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  106 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  107 â”‚    def query_skills_for_task(self, task_requirements: Dict) -> List[SkillMatch]:                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  108 â”‚        """Query optimal skills for specific task requirements"""                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  109 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  110 â”‚        cypher_query = """                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  111 â”‚        MATCH (t:TaskType {category: $category})-[:REQUIRES_SKILL]->(s:Skill)                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  112 â”‚        MATCH (s)-[:REQUIRES_TOOL]->(tool:Tool)                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  113 â”‚        WHERE tool.category IN $required_tool_categories                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  114 â”‚        WITH s, collect(tool) as tools                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  115 â”‚        MATCH (a:Agent)-[:HAS_CAPABILITY]->(c:Capability)-[:MAPS_TO_SKILL]->(s)                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  116 â”‚        RETURN s, tools, collect(a) as capable_agents,                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  117 â”‚               avg(c.proficiency) as avg_proficiency                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  118 â”‚        ORDER BY avg_proficiency DESC                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  119 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  120 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  121 â”‚        result = self.neo4j.run(cypher_query,                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  122 â”‚                               category=task_requirements.get("category"),                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  123 â”‚                               required_tool_categories=task_requirements.get("tools", []))                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  124 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  125 â”‚        return [self._parse_skill_match(record) for record in result]                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  126 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  127 â”‚class ToolRegistry:                                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  128 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  129 â”‚    Microservice for managing tool and technology definitions                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  130 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  131 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  132 â”‚    def __init__(self, neo4j_client):                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  133 â”‚        self.neo4j = neo4j_client                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  134 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  135 â”‚    def register_structured_reporting_tools(self):                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  136 â”‚        """Register tools specific to structured reporting capability"""                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  137 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  138 â”‚        structured_reporting_tools = [                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  139 â”‚            {                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  140 â”‚                "name": "StructuredReportGenerator",                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  141 â”‚                "category": "report_generation",                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  142 â”‚                "description": "Generates JSON-LD compliant structured reports",                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  143 â”‚                "version": "2.0",                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  144 â”‚                "capabilities": ["market_analysis", "financial_modeling", "risk_assessment"],                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  145 â”‚                "dependencies": ["anthropic_api", "json_ld_schemas", "pydantic_models"]                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  146 â”‚            },                                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  147 â”‚            {                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  148 â”‚                "name": "SlideGenerationEngine",                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  149 â”‚                "category": "presentation_tools",                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  150 â”‚                "description": "Creates professional presentation slide decks",                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  151 â”‚                "version": "1.0",                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  152 â”‚                "capabilities": ["slide_generation", "chart_creation", "template_management"],                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  153 â”‚                "dependencies": ["structured_reports", "chart_libraries", "presentation_templates"]                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  154 â”‚            },                                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  155 â”‚            {                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  156 â”‚                "name": "DashboardSpecificationGenerator",                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  157 â”‚                "category": "visualization_tools",                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  158 â”‚                "description": "Generates interactive dashboard specifications",                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  159 â”‚                "version": "1.0",                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  160 â”‚                "capabilities": ["dashboard_design", "visualization_specs", "interactivity_design"],                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  161 â”‚                "dependencies": ["vega_lite", "d3js", "interactive_libraries"]                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  162 â”‚            }                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  163 â”‚        ]                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  164 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  165 â”‚        for tool in structured_reporting_tools:                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  166 â”‚            self.register_tool(tool)                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  167 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  168 â”‚    def register_tool(self, tool_definition: Dict) -> ToolID:                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  169 â”‚        """Register tool in knowledge graph with relationships"""                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  170 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  171 â”‚        cypher_query = """                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  172 â”‚        CREATE (t:Tool {                                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  173 â”‚            name: $name,                                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  174 â”‚            category: $category,                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  175 â”‚            description: $description,                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  176 â”‚            version: $version,                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  177 â”‚            created_at: datetime()                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  178 â”‚        })                                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  179 â”‚        WITH t                                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  180 â”‚        UNWIND $capabilities as capability                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  181 â”‚        MERGE (c:Capability {name: capability})                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  182 â”‚        CREATE (t)-[:PROVIDES_CAPABILITY]->(c)                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  183 â”‚        WITH t                                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  184 â”‚        UNWIND $dependencies as dependency                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  185 â”‚        MERGE (d:Tool {name: dependency})                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  186 â”‚        CREATE (t)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(d)                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  187 â”‚        RETURN t.id as tool_id                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  188 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  189 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  190 â”‚        result = self.neo4j.run(cypher_query, **tool_definition)                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  191 â”‚        return result.single()["tool_id"]                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **1.3 Economic Governor Integration**                                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ Dual-Token Incentive System:                                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    1 â”‚class EconomicGovernor:                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    2 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    3 â”‚    Comprehensive economic governance system with VWT/CVT dual-token framework                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    4 â”‚    Integrates with existing MAS system to provide economic incentives                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    5 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    6 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    7 â”‚    def __init__(self, mas_system):                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    8 â”‚        self.mas_system = mas_system                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    9 â”‚        self.token_service = TokenService()                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   10 â”‚        self.consensus_service = ConsensusService()                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   11 â”‚        self.incentive_service = IncentiveService()                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   12 â”‚        self.socioeconomic_model = SocioeconomicModelService()                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   13 â”‚        self.governance_service = GovernanceService()                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   14 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   15 â”‚    def initialize_token_economy(self, organization_config: Dict):                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   16 â”‚        """Initialize dual-token economy for the MAS organization"""                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   17 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   18 â”‚        # Initialize VWT (Value Work Token) - operational rewards                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   19 â”‚        vwt_config = TokenConfig(                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   20 â”‚            name="VWT",                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   21 â”‚            type="utility_token",                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   22 â”‚            purpose="operational_rewards",                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   23 â”‚            initial_supply=0,  # Minted based on project funding                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   24 â”‚            utility_function=self._vwt_utility_function,                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   25 â”‚            distribution_mechanism="performance_based"                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   26 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   27 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   28 â”‚        # Initialize CVT (Conviction Token) - governance rights                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   29 â”‚        cvt_config = TokenConfig(                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   30 â”‚            name="CVT",                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   31 â”‚            type="governance_token",                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   32 â”‚            purpose="voting_rights",                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   33 â”‚            initial_supply=420042,  # Fixed supply based on rank hierarchy                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   34 â”‚            utility_function=self._cvt_utility_function,                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   35 â”‚            distribution_mechanism="rank_based"                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   36 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   37 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   38 â”‚        self.token_service.initialize_tokens(vwt_config, cvt_config)                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   39 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   40 â”‚        # Distribute initial CVT based on agent ranks                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   41 â”‚        self._distribute_initial_cvt_by_rank()                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   42 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   43 â”‚    def _vwt_utility_function(self, quantity: float) -> float:                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   44 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   45 â”‚        VWT utility function implementing diminishing returns                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   46 â”‚        U(q) = k1*q for q <= Q_basic, k1*Q_basic + k2*ln(1 + q - Q_basic) for q > Q_basic                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   47 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   48 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   49 â”‚        Q_basic = 100  # Satiation point for basic needs                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   50 â”‚        k1 = 2.0       # High utility for basic needs                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   51 â”‚        k2 = 0.5       # Lower utility for supplemental perks                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   52 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   53 â”‚        if quantity <= Q_basic:                                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   54 â”‚            return k1 * quantity                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   55 â”‚        else:                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   56 â”‚            return k1 * Q_basic + k2 * math.log(1 + quantity - Q_basic)                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   57 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   58 â”‚    def _cvt_utility_function(self, quantity: float) -> float:                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   59 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   60 â”‚        CVT utility function for governance power                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   61 â”‚        Higher CVT = more voting power with conviction multipliers                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   62 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   63 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   64 â”‚        # Base voting power                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   65 â”‚        base_power = math.sqrt(quantity)                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   66 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   67 â”‚        # Conviction multiplier based on lock duration                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   68 â”‚        conviction_multiplier = 1.0  # Can be increased by locking tokens                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   69 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   70 â”‚        return base_power * conviction_multiplier                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   71 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   72 â”‚    def _distribute_initial_cvt_by_rank(self):                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   73 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   74 â”‚        Distribute CVT based on agent rank hierarchy                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   75 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   76 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   77 â”‚        cvt_allocation_by_rank = {                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   78 â”‚            5: 9047,   # Rank 5 agents (CEO-level)                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   79 â”‚            4: 7931,   # Rank 4 agents (Director-level)                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   80 â”‚            3: 6493,   # Rank 3 agents (Senior-level)                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   81 â”‚            2: 4466,   # Rank 2 agents (Mid-level)                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   82 â”‚            1: 1000    # Rank 1 agents (Junior-level)                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   83 â”‚        }                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   84 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   85 â”‚        for agent in self.mas_system.agents:                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   86 â”‚            agent_rank = getattr(agent, 'rank', 3)  # Default to rank 3                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   87 â”‚            cvt_amount = cvt_allocation_by_rank.get(agent_rank, 1000)                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   88 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   89 â”‚            self.token_service.mint_cvt(                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   90 â”‚                recipient=agent.name,                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   91 â”‚                amount=cvt_amount,                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   92 â”‚                reason="initial_rank_based_allocation"                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   93 â”‚            )                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   94 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   95 â”‚    def calculate_vwt_rewards(self, agent_performance: Dict) -> Dict[str, float]:                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   96 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   97 â”‚        Calculate VWT rewards based on agent performance in structured reporting                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   98 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   99 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  100 â”‚        rewards = {}                                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  101 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  102 â”‚        for agent_name, performance in agent_performance.items():                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  103 â”‚            # Base reward calculation                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  104 â”‚            base_reward = self._calculate_base_vwt_reward(performance)                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  105 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  106 â”‚            # Quality multipliers                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  107 â”‚            quality_multiplier = self._calculate_quality_multiplier(performance)                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  108 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  109 â”‚            # Collaboration bonuses                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  110 â”‚            collaboration_bonus = self._calculate_collaboration_bonus(agent_name, performance)                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  111 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  112 â”‚            # Innovation bonuses                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  113 â”‚            innovation_bonus = self._calculate_innovation_bonus(performance)                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  114 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  115 â”‚            # Calculate final reward                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  116 â”‚            total_reward = base_reward * quality_multiplier + collaboration_bonus + innovation_bonus                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  117 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  118 â”‚            rewards[agent_name] = total_reward                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  119 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  120 â”‚            # Mint and distribute VWT                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  121 â”‚            self.token_service.mint_and_distribute_vwt(                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  122 â”‚                recipient=agent_name,                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  123 â”‚                amount=total_reward,                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  124 â”‚                reason="performance_based_reward",                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  125 â”‚                performance_metadata=performance                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  126 â”‚            )                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  127 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  128 â”‚        return rewards                                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  129 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  130 â”‚    def _calculate_base_vwt_reward(self, performance: Dict) -> float:                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  131 â”‚        """Calculate base VWT reward from performance metrics"""                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  132 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  133 â”‚        # Structured reporting specific rewards                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  134 â”‚        if "structured_report" in performance:                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  135 â”‚            report_quality = performance["structured_report"].get("quality_score", 0.5)                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  136 â”‚            schema_compliance = performance["structured_report"].get("schema_compliance", 0.0)                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  137 â”‚            user_satisfaction = performance["structured_report"].get("user_satisfaction", 0.5)                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  138 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  139 â”‚            base_reward = (                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  140 â”‚                report_quality * 50 +           # Up to 50 VWT for quality                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  141 â”‚                schema_compliance * 30 +        # Up to 30 VWT for compliance                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  142 â”‚                user_satisfaction * 20          # Up to 20 VWT for satisfaction                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  143 â”‚            )                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  144 â”‚        else:                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  145 â”‚            # Standard MAS performance                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  146 â”‚            base_reward = performance.get("consensus_contribution", 0.5) * 40                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  147 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  148 â”‚        return base_reward                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  149 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  150 â”‚class ConsensusService:                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  151 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  152 â”‚    ZK-SNARK based consensus validation for agent contributions                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  153 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  154 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  155 â”‚    def __init__(self):                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  156 â”‚        self.zk_circuit_compiler = ZKCircuitCompiler()                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  157 â”‚        self.proof_validator = ZKProofValidator()                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  158 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  159 â”‚    def validate_agent_contribution(self, contribution: AgentContribution) -> ValidationResult:                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  160 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  161 â”‚        Validate agent contribution using ZK-SNARKs                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  162 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  163 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  164 â”‚        # Generate ZK circuit for contribution validation                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  165 â”‚        circuit = self.zk_circuit_compiler.compile_contribution_circuit(                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  166 â”‚            contribution_type=contribution.type,                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  167 â”‚            quality_metrics=contribution.quality_metrics,                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  168 â”‚            compliance_requirements=contribution.compliance_requirements                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  169 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  170 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  171 â”‚        # Generate proof                                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  172 â”‚        private_inputs = {                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  173 â”‚            "actual_quality_score": contribution.quality_score,                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  174 â”‚            "actual_compliance_score": contribution.compliance_score,                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  175 â”‚            "agent_capabilities": contribution.agent_capabilities                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  176 â”‚        }                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  177 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  178 â”‚        public_inputs = {                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  179 â”‚            "minimum_quality_threshold": 0.7,                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  180 â”‚            "required_compliance_level": 0.9,                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  181 â”‚            "contribution_hash": contribution.hash                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  182 â”‚        }                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  183 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  184 â”‚        proof = circuit.generate_proof(private_inputs, public_inputs)                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  185 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  186 â”‚        # Validate proof                                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  187 â”‚        is_valid = self.proof_validator.verify_proof(                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  188 â”‚            circuit.verification_key,                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  189 â”‚            public_inputs,                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  190 â”‚            proof                                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  191 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  192 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  193 â”‚        return ValidationResult(                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  194 â”‚            is_valid=is_valid,                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  195 â”‚            proof=proof,                                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  196 â”‚            validation_timestamp=datetime.now(),                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  197 â”‚            validator_id="consensus_service"                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  198 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚   57 â”‚    @event_handler("analysis_request_received")                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   58 â”‚    async def handle_analysis_request(self, event: AnalysisRequestEvent) -> AnalysisResult:                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   59 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   60 â”‚        Handle analysis request using DKG-driven agent allocation                                                     â”‚ â”‚
