 â”‚ â”‚   62 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   63 â”‚        # Query DKG for optimal agent configuration                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   64 â”‚        optimal_config = await self.dkg_client.query_optimal_agent_config(                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   65 â”‚            task_type=event.analysis_type,                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   66 â”‚            complexity_level=event.complexity,                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   67 â”‚            quality_requirements=event.quality_requirements                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   68 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   69 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   70 â”‚        # Allocate agents based on DKG recommendations                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   71 â”‚        allocated_agents = await self._allocate_agents_from_dkg(optimal_config)                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   72 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   73 â”‚        # Execute analysis with economic incentive tracking                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   74 â”‚        analysis_result = await self._execute_incentivized_analysis(                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   75 â”‚            agents=allocated_agents,                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   76 â”‚            task=event.task,                                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   77 â”‚            economic_context=event.economic_context                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   78 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   79 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   80 â”‚        # Calculate and distribute VWT rewards                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   81 â”‚        performance_metrics = self._extract_performance_metrics(analysis_result)                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   82 â”‚        rewards = self.economic_governor.calculate_vwt_rewards(performance_metrics)                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   83 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   84 â”‚        # Publish completion event                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   85 â”‚        await self._publish_analysis_complete_event(analysis_result, rewards)                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   86 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   87 â”‚        return analysis_result                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   88 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   89 â”‚    async def _execute_incentivized_analysis(self, agents: List[Agent],                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   90 â”‚                                           task: AnalysisTask,                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   91 â”‚                                           economic_context: Dict) -> AnalysisResult:                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   92 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   93 â”‚        Execute analysis with economic incentive mechanisms                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   94 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   95 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   96 â”‚        # Create performance tracking context                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   97 â”‚        performance_tracker = PerformanceTracker()                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   98 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   99 â”‚        # Execute agents with incentive awareness                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  100 â”‚        agent_results = {}                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  101 â”‚        for agent in agents:                                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  102 â”‚            # Set economic incentive context                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  103 â”‚            agent.set_economic_context({                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  104 â”‚                "potential_vwt_reward": economic_context.get("base_reward", 50),                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  105 â”‚                "quality_multiplier_available": economic_context.get("quality_multiplier", 1.5),                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  106 â”‚                "collaboration_bonus_potential": economic_context.get("collaboration_bonus", 20)                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  107 â”‚            })                                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  108 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  109 â”‚            # Execute with performance tracking                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  110 â”‚            with performance_tracker.track_agent_performance(agent.name):                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  111 â”‚                agent_result = await agent.execute_analysis_task(task)                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  112 â”‚                agent_results[agent.name] = agent_result                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  113 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  114 â”‚        # Build consensus with economic incentives for quality                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  115 â”‚        consensus_result = await self._build_economically_incentivized_consensus(                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  116 â”‚            agent_results, economic_context                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  117 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  118 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  119 â”‚        return AnalysisResult(                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  120 â”‚            consensus=consensus_result,                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  121 â”‚            individual_contributions=agent_results,                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  122 â”‚            performance_metrics=performance_tracker.get_metrics(),                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  123 â”‚            economic_impact=self._calculate_economic_impact(consensus_result)                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  124 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **2.2 Immersive 3D Analytics as AAM Service**                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ WebXR Analytics Microservice:                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    1 â”‚@aam_service(                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    2 â”‚    name="immersive-3d-analytics-service",                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    3 â”‚    bounded_context="ImmersiveVisualization",                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    4 â”‚    version="1.0"                                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    5 â”‚)                                                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    6 â”‚class Immersive3DAnalyticsAAMService:                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    7 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚   10 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚   12 â”‚        self.dkg_client = dkg_client                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚   17 â”‚    @event_handler("3d_visualization_request")                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   18 â”‚    async def handle_3d_visualization_request(self, event: VisualizationRequestEvent):                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   19 â”‚        """Handle 3D visualization requests with DKG skill querying"""                                                â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚   21 â”‚        # Query DKG for 3D visualization skills and tools                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   22 â”‚        visualization_skills = await self.dkg_client.query_skills_for_task({                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   23 â”‚            "category": "3d_visualization",                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   24 â”‚            "complexity": event.complexity_level,                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   25 â”‚            "output_format": "webxr"                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   26 â”‚        })                                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   27 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   28 â”‚        # Allocate agents with spatial reasoning capabilities                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   29 â”‚        spatial_agents = await self._allocate_spatial_reasoning_agents(                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   30 â”‚            required_skills=visualization_skills,                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   31 â”‚            data_complexity=event.data_complexity                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   32 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   33 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   34 â”‚        # Execute 3D analytics with economic incentives                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   35 â”‚        visualization_result = await self._execute_incentivized_3d_analytics(                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   36 â”‚            agents=spatial_agents,                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   37 â”‚            data=event.data,                                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   38 â”‚            visualization_requirements=event.requirements                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   39 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   40 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   41 â”‚        # Calculate specialized rewards for 3D innovation                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   42 â”‚        rewards = self._calculate_3d_analytics_rewards(visualization_result)                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   43 â”‚        await self.economic_governor.distribute_specialized_rewards(rewards)                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   44 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   45 â”‚        return visualization_result                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   46 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   47 â”‚    async def _execute_incentivized_3d_analytics(self, agents: List[Agent],                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   48 â”‚                                                data: Dict,                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   49 â”‚                                                requirements: VisualizationRequirements) -> Dict:                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   50 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   51 â”‚        Execute 3D analytics with economic incentives for innovation                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   52 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   53 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   54 â”‚        # Enhanced incentive structure for 3D innovation                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   55 â”‚        innovation_incentives = {                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   56 â”‚            "spatial_optimization_bonus": 100,      # VWT for optimized 3D layouts                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   57 â”‚            "interaction_design_bonus": 80,         # VWT for intuitive interactions                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   58 â”‚            "performance_optimization_bonus": 60,   # VWT for render performance                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   59 â”‚            "accessibility_bonus": 40               # VWT for accessibility features                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   60 â”‚        }                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   61 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   62 â”‚        spatial_analysis_results = {}                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   63 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   64 â”‚        for agent in agents:                                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   65 â”‚            # Set 3D-specific economic context                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   66 â”‚            agent.set_economic_context({                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   67 â”‚                "innovation_incentives": innovation_incentives,                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   68 â”‚                "performance_targets": {                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   69 â”‚                    "render_fps": 60,                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   70 â”‚                    "interaction_latency": 20,  # ms                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   71 â”‚                    "accessibility_score": 0.9                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   72 â”‚                }                                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   73 â”‚            })                                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   74 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   75 â”‚            # Execute spatial reasoning tasks                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   76 â”‚            if agent.__class__.__name__ == "GLAC":                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   77 â”‚                # Strategic spatial layout optimization                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   78 â”‚                layout_result = await agent.optimize_3d_layout(data, requirements)                                    â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚   80 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   81 â”‚            elif agent.__class__.__name__ == "TASA-NS-Alg":                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   82 â”‚                # Abstract pattern visualization                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   83 â”‚                pattern_result = await agent.visualize_abstract_patterns(data, requirements)                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   84 â”‚                spatial_analysis_results["patterns"] = pattern_result                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   85 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   86 â”‚        # Synthesize 3D visualization                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   87 â”‚        final_visualization = await self.webxr_engine.synthesize_3d_visualization(                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   88 â”‚            spatial_analysis_results, requirements                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   89 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   90 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   91 â”‚        return {                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   92 â”‚            "visualization_spec": final_visualization,                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   93 â”‚            "performance_metrics": self._calculate_3d_performance_metrics(final_visualization),                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   94 â”‚            "innovation_score": self._assess_3d_innovation_level(final_visualization),                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   95 â”‚            "agent_contributions": spatial_analysis_results                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   96 â”‚        }                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   97 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    1 â”‚@aam_service(                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    2 â”‚    name="collaborative-analysis-service",                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    3 â”‚    bounded_context="CollaborativeIntelligence",                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    4 â”‚    version="1.0"                                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    5 â”‚)                                                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    6 â”‚class CollaborativeAnalysisAAMService:                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    7 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚   12 â”‚        self.dkg_client = dkg_client                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚   14 â”‚        self.collaboration_engine = CollaborationEngine()                                                             â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚   16 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   17 â”‚    @event_handler("collaborative_session_initiated")                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   18 â”‚    async def handle_collaborative_session(self, event: CollaborationSessionEvent):                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   19 â”‚        """Handle multi-user collaborative analysis sessions"""                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   20 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   21 â”‚        session = CollaborationSession(                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   22 â”‚            session_id=event.session_id,                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   23 â”‚            participants=event.participants,                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   24 â”‚            analysis_objective=event.objective                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   25 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   26 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   27 â”‚        # Query DKG for collaborative analysis strategies                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   28 â”‚        collaboration_strategies = await self.dkg_client.query_collaboration_strategies(                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   29 â”‚            session_type=event.session_type,                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   30 â”‚            participant_count=len(event.participants),                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   31 â”‚            analysis_complexity=event.complexity                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   32 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   33 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   34 â”‚        # Allocate agents with collaboration bonuses                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   35 â”‚        collaborative_agents = await self._allocate_collaborative_agents(                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   36 â”‚            strategies=collaboration_strategies,                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   37 â”‚            economic_incentives=self._calculate_collaboration_incentives(session)                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   38 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   39 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   40 â”‚        # Execute collaborative analysis                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   41 â”‚        collaborative_result = await self._execute_collaborative_analysis(                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   42 â”‚            session=session,                                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   43 â”‚            agents=collaborative_agents,                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   44 â”‚            real_time_sync=True                                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   45 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   46 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   47 â”‚        return collaborative_result                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   48 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   49 â”‚    def _calculate_collaboration_incentives(self, session: CollaborationSession) -> Dict:                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   50 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   51 â”‚        Calculate economic incentives for collaborative analysis                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   52 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   53 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   54 â”‚        base_collaboration_bonus = 25  # VWT per participant                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   55 â”‚        quality_multiplier_bonus = 1.3  # 30% bonus for collaborative quality                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   56 â”‚        consensus_achievement_bonus = 50  # VWT for reaching high-quality consensus                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   57 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   58 â”‚        return {                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   59 â”‚            "base_collaboration_bonus": base_collaboration_bonus * len(session.participants),                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   60 â”‚            "quality_multiplier": quality_multiplier_bonus,                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   61 â”‚            "consensus_bonus": consensus_achievement_bonus,                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   62 â”‚            "innovation_collaboration_bonus": 75  # Extra VWT for collaborative innovation                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   63 â”‚        }                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   64 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   65 â”‚    async def _execute_collaborative_analysis(self, session: CollaborationSession,                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   66 â”‚                                            agents: List[Agent],                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   67 â”‚                                            real_time_sync: bool) -> Dict:                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   68 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   69 â”‚        Execute analysis with real-time collaboration and economic incentives                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   70 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   71 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   72 â”‚        # Initialize real-time collaboration context                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   73 â”‚        collab_context = RealTimeCollaborationContext(                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   74 â”‚            session_id=session.session_id,                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   75 â”‚            websocket_manager=self.collaboration_engine.websocket_manager,                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   76 â”‚            state_synchronizer=self.collaboration_engine.state_synchronizer                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   77 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   78 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   79 â”‚        # Execute agents with collaborative incentives                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   80 â”‚        collaborative_results = {}                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   81 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   82 â”‚        for agent in agents:                                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   83 â”‚            # Set collaborative economic context                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   84 â”‚            agent.set_collaborative_context({                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   85 â”‚                "collaboration_bonus_potential": session.collaboration_incentives["base_collaboration_bonus"],        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   86 â”‚                "consensus_bonus_available": session.collaboration_incentives["consensus_bonus"],                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   87 â”‚                "real_time_feedback_enabled": real_time_sync,                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   88 â”‚                "peer_agents": [a.name for a in agents if a != agent]                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   89 â”‚            })                                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   90 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   91 â”‚            # Execute with real-time updates                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   92 â”‚            agent_result = await agent.execute_collaborative_task(                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   93 â”‚                task=session.analysis_objective,                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   94 â”‚                collaboration_context=collab_context,                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   95 â”‚                economic_incentives=session.collaboration_incentives                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   96 â”‚            )                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   97 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   98 â”‚            collaborative_results[agent.name] = agent_result                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   99 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  100 â”‚            # Real-time broadcast to session participants                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  101 â”‚            if real_time_sync:                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  102 â”‚                await collab_context.broadcast_agent_update(                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  103 â”‚                    agent_id=agent.name,                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  104 â”‚                    partial_result=agent_result,                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  105 â”‚                    timestamp=datetime.now()                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  106 â”‚                )                                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  107 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  108 â”‚        # Build collaborative consensus with economic validation                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  109 â”‚        consensus = await self.consensus_builder.build_incentivized_consensus(                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  110 â”‚            agent_results=collaborative_results,                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  111 â”‚            session=session,                                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  112 â”‚            economic_context=session.collaboration_incentives                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  113 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  114 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  115 â”‚        # Calculate and distribute collaborative rewards                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  116 â”‚        collaborative_rewards = self._calculate_collaborative_rewards(                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  117 â”‚            consensus, collaborative_results, session                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  118 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  119 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  120 â”‚        await self.economic_governor.distribute_collaborative_rewards(collaborative_rewards)                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  121 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  122 â”‚        return {                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  123 â”‚            "collaborative_consensus": consensus,                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  124 â”‚            "individual_contributions": collaborative_results,                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  125 â”‚            "collaboration_quality_score": self._assess_collaboration_quality(consensus),                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  126 â”‚            "economic_rewards_distributed": collaborative_rewards,                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  127 â”‚            "session_metadata": session.to_dict()                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  128 â”‚        }                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **2.4 Agent Factory Enhancement**                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ Dynamic Agent Creation with DKG:                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    1 â”‚class EnhancedAgentFactory:                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    2 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    3 â”‚    Enhanced agent factory that creates agents dynamically based on DKG knowledge                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    4 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    5 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    6 â”‚    def __init__(self, dkg_client, economic_governor):                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    7 â”‚        self.dkg_client = dkg_client                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    8 â”‚        self.economic_governor = economic_governor                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    9 â”‚        self.persona_service = PersonaService(dkg_client)                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   10 â”‚        self.container_builder = AgentContainerBuilder()                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   11 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   12 â”‚    async def create_specialized_agent(self, agent_request: AgentCreationRequest) -> Agent:                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   13 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   14 â”‚        Create specialized agent based on task requirements and DKG knowledge                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   15 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   16 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   17 â”‚        # Query DKG for optimal agent configuration                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   18 â”‚        optimal_config = await self.dkg_client.query_optimal_agent_configuration(                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   19 â”‚            task_type=agent_request.task_type,                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   20 â”‚            required_capabilities=agent_request.capabilities,                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   21 â”‚            performance_requirements=agent_request.performance_requirements                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   22 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   23 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   24 â”‚        # Select base agent type based on DKG analysis                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   25 â”‚        base_agent_type = self._select_base_agent_type(optimal_config)                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   26 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   27 â”‚        # Create persona from DKG persona service                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   28 â”‚        agent_persona = await self.persona_service.create_specialized_persona(                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   29 â”‚            base_role=optimal_config.recommended_role,                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   30 â”‚            specialization=agent_request.specialization,                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   31 â”‚            skill_requirements=optimal_config.required_skills                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   32 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   33 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   34 â”‚        # Configure economic incentive profile                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   35 â”‚        economic_profile = self._create_economic_profile(                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   36 â”‚            agent_persona, optimal_config                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   37 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   38 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   39 â”‚        # Create agent instance                                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   40 â”‚        specialized_agent = self._instantiate_specialized_agent(                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   41 â”‚            base_type=base_agent_type,                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   42 â”‚            persona=agent_persona,                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   43 â”‚            economic_profile=economic_profile,                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   44 â”‚            dkg_client=self.dkg_client                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   45 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   46 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   47 â”‚        # Register agent in economic system                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   48 â”‚        await self.economic_governor.register_agent(                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   49 â”‚            agent=specialized_agent,                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   50 â”‚            initial_cvt_allocation=self._calculate_initial_cvt(agent_persona.rank),                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   51 â”‚            performance_expectations=optimal_config.performance_expectations                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   52 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   53 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   54 â”‚        # Deploy agent as containerized microservice                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   55 â”‚        await self._deploy_agent_as_microservice(specialized_agent)                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   56 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   57 â”‚        return specialized_agent                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   58 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   59 â”‚    def _instantiate_specialized_agent(self, base_type: str,                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   60 â”‚                                     persona: AgentPersona,                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   61 â”‚                                     economic_profile: EconomicProfile,                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   62 â”‚                                     dkg_client: DKGClient) -> Agent:                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   63 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   64 â”‚        Instantiate specialized agent with full DKG and economic integration                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   65 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   66 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   67 â”‚        if base_type == "TSGLA":                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   68 â”‚            agent = EnhancedTSGLAAgent(                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   69 â”‚                name=persona.name,                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   70 â”‚                strategy_params=persona.strategy_params,                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   71 â”‚                dkg_client=dkg_client,                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   72 â”‚                economic_profile=economic_profile,                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   73 â”‚                specialization=persona.specialization                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   74 â”‚            )                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   75 â”‚        elif base_type == "GLAC":                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   76 â”‚            agent = EnhancedGLACAgent(                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   77 â”‚                name=persona.name,                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   78 â”‚                strategy_params=persona.strategy_params,                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   79 â”‚                dkg_client=dkg_client,                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   80 â”‚                economic_profile=economic_profile,                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   81 â”‚                specialization=persona.specialization                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   82 â”‚            )                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   83 â”‚        elif base_type == "TASA-NS-Alg":                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   84 â”‚            agent = EnhancedTASAAgent(                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   85 â”‚                name=persona.name,                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   86 â”‚                strategy_params=persona.strategy_params,                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   87 â”‚                dkg_client=dkg_client,                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   88 â”‚                economic_profile=economic_profile,                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   89 â”‚                specialization=persona.specialization                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   90 â”‚            )                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   91 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   92 â”‚        # Enhance agent with DKG-driven capabilities                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   93 â”‚        agent.enable_dkg_skill_discovery()                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   94 â”‚        agent.enable_economic_incentive_optimization()                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   95 â”‚        agent.enable_collaborative_learning()                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   96 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   97 â”‚        return agent                                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   98 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   99 â”‚class EnhancedTSGLAAgent(TSGLA_Agent):                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  100 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  101 â”‚    Enhanced TSGLA agent with DKG integration and economic incentives                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  102 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  103 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  104 â”‚    def __init__(self, name, strategy_params, dkg_client, economic_profile, specialization):                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  105 â”‚        super().__init__(name, strategy_params, None, None, None)  # Remove hardcoded dependencies                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  106 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  107 â”‚        self.dkg_client = dkg_client                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  108 â”‚        self.economic_profile = economic_profile                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  109 â”‚        self.specialization = specialization                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  110 â”‚        self.current_vwt_balance = 0.0                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  111 â”‚        self.current_cvt_balance = economic_profile.initial_cvt                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  112 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  113 â”‚    async def execute_analysis_task(self, task: AnalysisTask) -> AgentResult:                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  114 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  115 â”‚        Execute analysis task with DKG knowledge and economic optimization                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  116 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  117 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  118 â”‚        # Query DKG for relevant knowledge                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  119 â”‚        relevant_knowledge = await self.dkg_client.query_relevant_knowledge(                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  120 â”‚            task_type=task.type,                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  121 â”‚            agent_specialization=self.specialization,                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  122 â”‚            required_output_quality=task.quality_requirements                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  123 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  124 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  125 â”‚        # Apply economic incentive optimization                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  126 â”‚        optimized_strategy = self._optimize_strategy_for_incentives(                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  127 â”‚            base_strategy=self.strategy_params,                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  128 â”‚            economic_context=self.economic_profile.current_incentives,                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  129 â”‚            potential_rewards=task.potential_vwt_rewards                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  130 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  131 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  132 â”‚        # Execute with enhanced capabilities                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  133 â”‚        analysis_result = await self._execute_with_dkg_knowledge(                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  134 â”‚            task=task,                                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  135 â”‚            knowledge_context=relevant_knowledge,                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  136 â”‚            optimized_strategy=optimized_strategy                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  137 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  138 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  139 â”‚        # Self-assess economic performance                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  140 â”‚        economic_performance = self._assess_economic_performance(                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  141 â”‚            result=analysis_result,                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  142 â”‚            incentive_targets=self.economic_profile.current_incentives                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  143 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  144 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  145 â”‚        return AgentResult(                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  146 â”‚            analysis=analysis_result,                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  147 â”‚            economic_performance=economic_performance,                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  148 â”‚            dkg_knowledge_utilized=relevant_knowledge,                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  149 â”‚            innovation_contributions=self._identify_innovations(analysis_result)                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  150 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  151 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  152 â”‚    def _optimize_strategy_for_incentives(self, base_strategy: Tuple,                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  153 â”‚                                        economic_context: Dict,                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  154 â”‚                                        potential_rewards: Dict) -> Tuple:                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  155 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  156 â”‚        Optimize agent strategy based on economic incentives                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  157 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  158 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  159 â”‚        k, bias_type, equilibrium_type = base_strategy                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  160 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  161 â”‚        # Adjust strategy based on economic incentives                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  162 â”‚        if potential_rewards.get("quality_bonus", 0) > 50:                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  163 â”‚            # Increase k for higher quality analysis                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  164 â”‚            k = min(k + 1, 3)  # Cap at 3                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  165 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  166 â”‚        if economic_context.get("collaboration_bonus_active", False):                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  167 â”‚            # Adjust bias toward collaborative optimization                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  168 â”‚            if bias_type == "negative":                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  169 â”‚                bias_type = "unbiased"  # More collaborative                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  170 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  171 â”‚        if potential_rewards.get("innovation_bonus", 0) > 100:                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  172 â”‚            # Encourage non-convergent exploration for innovation                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  173 â”‚            if equilibrium_type == "fixed_point":                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  174 â”‚                equilibrium_type = "cycle"  # More exploratory                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  175 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  176 â”‚        return (k, bias_type, equilibrium_type)                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **Phase 3: Governance and Consensus Integration**                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **3.1 Conviction Voting Implementation**                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ Decentralized Decision Making:                                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    1 â”‚class ConvictionVotingService:                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    2 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    3 â”‚    Implement conviction voting mechanism for agent organization governance                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    4 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    5 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    6 â”‚    def __init__(self, token_service, governance_rules):                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    7 â”‚        self.token_service = token_service                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    8 â”‚        self.governance_rules = governance_rules                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    9 â”‚        self.active_proposals = {}                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   10 â”‚        self.conviction_tracker = ConvictionTracker()                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   11 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   12 â”‚    async def submit_proposal(self, proposal: GovernanceProposal) -> ProposalID:                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   13 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   14 â”‚        Submit governance proposal for conviction voting                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   15 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   16 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   17 â”‚        # Validate proposal format and requirements                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   18 â”‚        validation_result = self._validate_proposal(proposal)                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   19 â”‚        if not validation_result.is_valid:                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   20 â”‚            raise InvalidProposalError(validation_result.errors)                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   21 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   22 â”‚        # Create proposal in governance system                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   23 â”‚        proposal_id = self._create_proposal_record(proposal)                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   24 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   25 â”‚        # Initialize conviction tracking                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   26 â”‚        self.conviction_tracker.initialize_proposal_tracking(                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   27 â”‚            proposal_id=proposal_id,                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   28 â”‚            required_conviction_threshold=self._calculate_conviction_threshold(proposal),                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   29 â”‚            execution_delay=timedelta(hours=72)  # Security timelock                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   30 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   31 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   32 â”‚        # Publish proposal to event bus                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   33 â”‚        await self._publish_proposal_event(proposal_id, proposal)                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   34 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   35 â”‚        return proposal_id                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   36 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   37 â”‚    async def cast_conviction_vote(self, vote: ConvictionVote) -> VoteResult:                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   38 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   39 â”‚        Cast conviction vote with economic incentive consideration                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   40 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   41 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   42 â”‚        # Verify voter eligibility and CVT balance                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   43 â”‚        voter_eligibility = await self._verify_voter_eligibility(vote.voter_id)                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   44 â”‚        if not voter_eligibility.is_eligible:                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   45 â”‚            raise IneligibleVoterError(voter_eligibility.reason)                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   46 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   47 â”‚        # Calculate voting power based on CVT and conviction                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   48 â”‚        voting_power = self._calculate_voting_power(                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   49 â”‚            cvt_balance=voter_eligibility.cvt_balance,                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   50 â”‚            conviction_level=vote.conviction_level,                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   51 â”‚            lock_duration=vote.lock_duration                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   52 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   53 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   54 â”‚        # Record vote with economic implications                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   55 â”‚        vote_record = VoteRecord(                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   56 â”‚            proposal_id=vote.proposal_id,                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   57 â”‚            voter_id=vote.voter_id,                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   58 â”‚            direction=vote.direction,                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   59 â”‚            voting_power=voting_power,                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   60 â”‚            conviction_level=vote.conviction_level,                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   61 â”‚            economic_stake=vote.lock_duration * voter_eligibility.cvt_balance                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   62 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   63 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   64 â”‚        # Update conviction tracking                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   65 â”‚        await self.conviction_tracker.record_vote(vote_record)                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   66 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   67 â”‚        # Check if proposal reaches passing threshold                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   68 â”‚        current_conviction = await self.conviction_tracker.get_current_conviction(vote.proposal_id)                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   69 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   70 â”‚        if current_conviction >= self.governance_rules.passing_threshold:                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   71 â”‚            await self._trigger_proposal_execution_queue(vote.proposal_id)                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   72 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   73 â”‚        return VoteResult(                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   74 â”‚            vote_recorded=True,                                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   75 â”‚            voting_power_applied=voting_power,                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   76 â”‚            current_conviction_level=current_conviction,                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   77 â”‚            proposal_status=await self._get_proposal_status(vote.proposal_id)                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   78 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   79 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   80 â”‚    def _calculate_voting_power(self, cvt_balance: float,                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   81 â”‚                              conviction_level: int,                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   82 â”‚                              lock_duration: timedelta) -> float:                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   83 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   84 â”‚        Calculate voting power based on CVT stake and conviction                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   85 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   86 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   87 â”‚        # Base voting power from CVT balance                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
