 â”‚ â”‚   88 â”‚        base_power = math.sqrt(cvt_balance)                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   89 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   90 â”‚        # Conviction multiplier (higher conviction = longer lock = more power)                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   91 â”‚        conviction_multiplier = 1.0 + (conviction_level * 0.1)  # 10% per conviction level                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   92 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   93 â”‚        # Time lock multiplier (longer lock = more commitment = more power)                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   94 â”‚        time_multiplier = 1.0 + (lock_duration.days / 365)  # Up to 2x for 1-year lock                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   95 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   96 â”‚        return base_power * conviction_multiplier * time_multiplier                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **3.2 Proposal Execution with Economic Impact**                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ Automated Governance Execution:                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    1 â”‚class ProposalExecutionEngine:                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    2 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    3 â”‚    Automated execution of passed proposals with economic impact tracking                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    4 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    5 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    6 â”‚    def __init__(self, economic_governor, platform_orchestrator):                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    7 â”‚        self.economic_governor = economic_governor                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    8 â”‚        self.platform_orchestrator = platform_orchestrator                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    9 â”‚        self.execution_queue = TimelockExecutionQueue()                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   10 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   11 â”‚    async def execute_capability_enhancement_proposal(self,                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   12 â”‚                                                    proposal: CapabilityEnhancementProposal) -> ExecutionResult:      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   13 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   14 â”‚        Execute proposal to enhance platform capability                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   15 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   16 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   17 â”‚        # Economic validation - ensure proposal has positive ROI projection                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   18 â”‚        economic_validation = await self._validate_economic_impact(proposal)                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   19 â”‚        if not economic_validation.is_economically_viable:                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   20 â”‚            return ExecutionResult(                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   21 â”‚                success=False,                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   22 â”‚                reason="Economic validation failed",                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   23 â”‚                details=economic_validation.details                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   24 â”‚            )                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   25 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   26 â”‚        # Execute capability enhancement                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   27 â”‚        if proposal.enhancement_type == "add_new_agents":                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   28 â”‚            execution_result = await self._execute_agent_addition(proposal)                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   29 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   30 â”‚        elif proposal.enhancement_type == "improve_existing_capability":                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   31 â”‚            execution_result = await self._execute_capability_improvement(proposal)                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   32 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   33 â”‚        elif proposal.enhancement_type == "integrate_new_technology":                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   34 â”‚            execution_result = await self._execute_technology_integration(proposal)                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   35 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   36 â”‚        # Track economic impact                                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   37 â”‚        economic_impact = await self._track_economic_impact(                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   38 â”‚            proposal, execution_result                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   39 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   40 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   41 â”‚        # Distribute rewards for successful proposal execution                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   42 â”‚        if execution_result.success:                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   43 â”‚            await self._distribute_execution_rewards(proposal, execution_result)                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   44 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   45 â”‚        return ExecutionResult(                                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   46 â”‚            success=execution_result.success,                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   47 â”‚            capability_changes=execution_result.changes,                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   48 â”‚            economic_impact=economic_impact,                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   49 â”‚            performance_improvements=execution_result.performance_improvements                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   50 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   51 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   52 â”‚    async def _execute_agent_addition(self, proposal: CapabilityEnhancementProposal) -> Dict:                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   53 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   54 â”‚        Execute proposal to add new specialized agents                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   55 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   56 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   57 â”‚        new_agents = []                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   58 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   59 â”‚        for agent_spec in proposal.new_agent_specifications:                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   60 â”‚            # Create agent using enhanced factory                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   61 â”‚            new_agent = await self.platform_orchestrator.agent_factory.create_specialized_agent(                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   62 â”‚                AgentCreationRequest(                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   63 â”‚                    task_type=agent_spec.task_type,                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   64 â”‚                    capabilities=agent_spec.required_capabilities,                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   65 â”‚                    specialization=agent_spec.specialization,                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   66 â”‚                    performance_requirements=agent_spec.performance_targets,                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   67 â”‚                    economic_profile=agent_spec.economic_profile                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   68 â”‚                )                                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   69 â”‚            )                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   70 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   71 â”‚            new_agents.append(new_agent)                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   72 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   73 â”‚            # Register in economic system                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   74 â”‚            await self.economic_governor.register_new_agent(                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   75 â”‚                agent=new_agent,                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   76 â”‚                initial_cvt=self._calculate_initial_cvt_for_new_agent(agent_spec),                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   77 â”‚                performance_baseline=agent_spec.performance_baseline                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   78 â”‚            )                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   79 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   80 â”‚        # Update platform capability registry                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   81 â”‚        await self.platform_orchestrator.capability_registry.update_agent_capabilities(new_agents)                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   82 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   83 â”‚        return {                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   84 â”‚            "agents_created": len(new_agents),                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   85 â”‚            "new_agent_ids": [agent.name for agent in new_agents],                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   86 â”‚            "capability_enhancement": self._assess_capability_enhancement(new_agents),                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   87 â”‚            "economic_impact": self._project_economic_impact(new_agents)                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   88 â”‚        }                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **Phase 4: Advanced Economic Incentive Mechanisms**                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **4.1 Socioeconomic Model Integration**                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ Advanced User Needs Modeling:                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    1 â”‚class SocioeconomicModelService:                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    2 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    3 â”‚    Advanced socioeconomic modeling for user needs prediction and platform optimization                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    4 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    5 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    6 â”‚    def __init__(self, economic_governor):                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    7 â”‚        self.economic_governor = economic_governor                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    8 â”‚        self.user_behavior_analyzer = UserBehaviorAnalyzer()                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    9 â”‚        self.economic_impact_calculator = EconomicImpactCalculator()                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   10 â”‚        self.stabilization_mechanisms = TokenEconomyStabilizer()                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   11 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   12 â”‚    async def analyze_user_economic_context(self, user_context: Dict) -> UserEconomicProfile:                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   13 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   14 â”‚        Comprehensive user economic context analysis with 50-iteration refinement                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   15 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   16 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   17 â”‚        base_analysis = self._extract_base_economic_indicators(user_context)                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   18 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   19 â”‚        # 50-iteration refinement process                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   20 â”‚        refined_profile = await self._iterative_economic_refinement(                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   21 â”‚            base_analysis=base_analysis,                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   22 â”‚            iterations=50,                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   23 â”‚            convergence_threshold=0.02                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   24 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   25 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   26 â”‚        # Generate personalized economic incentive recommendations                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   27 â”‚        incentive_recommendations = self._generate_personalized_incentives(refined_profile)                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   28 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   29 â”‚        # Calculate platform value proposition for user                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   30 â”‚        value_proposition = self._calculate_personalized_value_proposition(                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   31 â”‚            user_profile=refined_profile,                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   32 â”‚            available_capabilities=self.economic_governor.get_available_capabilities()                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   33 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   34 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   35 â”‚        return UserEconomicProfile(                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   36 â”‚            financial_situation=refined_profile.financial_indicators,                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   37 â”‚            professional_context=refined_profile.professional_context,                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   38 â”‚            social_environment=refined_profile.social_indicators,                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   39 â”‚            health_wellness=refined_profile.wellness_indicators,                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   40 â”‚            age_experience=refined_profile.experience_indicators,                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   41 â”‚            personalized_incentives=incentive_recommendations,                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   42 â”‚            platform_value_proposition=value_proposition                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   43 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   44 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   45 â”‚    async def _iterative_economic_refinement(self, base_analysis: Dict,                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   46 â”‚                                           iterations: int,                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   47 â”‚                                           convergence_threshold: float) -> Dict:                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   48 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   49 â”‚        50-iteration economic needs refinement with pattern analysis                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   50 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   51 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   52 â”‚        current_analysis = base_analysis.copy()                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   53 â”‚        iteration_history = []                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   54 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   55 â”‚        for iteration in range(iterations):                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   56 â”‚            # Predict additional economic needs                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   57 â”‚            predicted_needs = self._predict_economic_needs(current_analysis)                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   58 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   59 â”‚            # Generate economic solutions                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   60 â”‚            predicted_solutions = self._generate_economic_solutions(predicted_needs)                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   61 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   62 â”‚            # Compare known vs predicted patterns                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   63 â”‚            pattern_analysis = self._analyze_economic_patterns(                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   64 â”‚                known_needs=current_analysis.get("known_needs", {}),                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   65 â”‚                predicted_needs=predicted_needs,                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   66 â”‚                known_solutions=current_analysis.get("known_solutions", []),                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   67 â”‚                predicted_solutions=predicted_solutions                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   68 â”‚            )                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   69 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   70 â”‚            # Extract top 33% correlating patterns                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   71 â”‚            top_correlations = self._extract_top_correlations(pattern_analysis, 0.33)                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   72 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   73 â”‚            # Generate new economic needs from patterns                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   74 â”‚            new_needs = self._generate_new_economic_needs(top_correlations)                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   75 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   76 â”‚            # Update analysis                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   77 â”‚            previous_analysis = current_analysis.copy()                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   78 â”‚            current_analysis.update(new_needs)                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   79 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   80 â”‚            iteration_history.append({                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   81 â”‚                "iteration": iteration,                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   82 â”‚                "new_needs_discovered": len(new_needs),                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   83 â”‚                "total_needs": len(current_analysis.get("all_needs", {})),                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   84 â”‚                "convergence_metric": self._calculate_convergence_metric(                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   85 â”‚                    previous_analysis, current_analysis                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   86 â”‚                )                                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   87 â”‚            })                                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   88 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   89 â”‚            # Check for convergence                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   90 â”‚            if iteration > 10:                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   91 â”‚                convergence_metric = iteration_history[-1]["convergence_metric"]                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   92 â”‚                if convergence_metric < convergence_threshold:                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   93 â”‚                    break                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   94 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   95 â”‚        return {                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   96 â”‚            "refined_economic_profile": current_analysis,                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   97 â”‚            "iteration_history": iteration_history,                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   98 â”‚            "convergence_achieved": iteration_history[-1]["convergence_metric"] < convergence_threshold,              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   99 â”‚            "final_needs_count": len(current_analysis.get("all_needs", {}))                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  100 â”‚        }                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  101 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  102 â”‚    def _predict_economic_needs(self, current_analysis: Dict) -> Dict:                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  103 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  104 â”‚        Predict economic needs based on socioeconomic modeling                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  105 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  106 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  107 â”‚        predicted_needs = {}                                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  108 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  109 â”‚        # Financial situation analysis                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  110 â”‚        financial_indicators = current_analysis.get("financial_indicators", {})                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  111 â”‚        if financial_indicators.get("income_stability", 0.5) < 0.7:                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  112 â”‚            predicted_needs["financial_security"] = 0.9                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  113 â”‚            predicted_needs["income_optimization"] = 0.8                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  114 â”‚            predicted_needs["investment_guidance"] = 0.7                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  115 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  116 â”‚        # Professional context analysis                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  117 â”‚        professional_context = current_analysis.get("professional_context", {})                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  118 â”‚        if professional_context.get("career_advancement_pressure", 0.5) > 0.6:                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  119 â”‚            predicted_needs["skill_development"] = 0.85                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  120 â”‚            predicted_needs["performance_analytics"] = 0.8                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  121 â”‚            predicted_needs["competitive_intelligence"] = 0.75                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  122 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  123 â”‚        # Health and productivity analysis                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  124 â”‚        wellness_indicators = current_analysis.get("wellness_indicators", {})                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  125 â”‚        if wellness_indicators.get("work_stress_level", 0.5) > 0.6:                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  126 â”‚            predicted_needs["productivity_optimization"] = 0.9                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  127 â”‚            predicted_needs["workflow_automation"] = 0.85                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  128 â”‚            predicted_needs["stress_reduction_tools"] = 0.7                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  129 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  130 â”‚        # Social collaboration needs                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  131 â”‚        social_indicators = current_analysis.get("social_indicators", {})                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  132 â”‚        if social_indicators.get("team_collaboration_importance", 0.5) > 0.7:                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  133 â”‚            predicted_needs["collaborative_analytics"] = 0.9                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  134 â”‚            predicted_needs["team_performance_insights"] = 0.8                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  135 â”‚            predicted_needs["shared_decision_making"] = 0.75                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  136 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  137 â”‚        return predicted_needs                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  138 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  139 â”‚    def adjust_platform_incentives(self, user_profiles: List[UserEconomicProfile]) -> IncentiveAdjustment:            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  140 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚  142 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  143 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  144 â”‚        # Aggregate user economic patterns                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  145 â”‚        aggregated_patterns = self._aggregate_user_patterns(user_profiles)                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  146 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  147 â”‚        # Calculate optimal incentive adjustments                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  148 â”‚        incentive_adjustments = {}                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  149 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  150 â”‚        # Adjust rewards for structured reporting based on user value perception                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  151 â”‚        if aggregated_patterns["structured_reporting_value"] > 0.8:                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  152 â”‚            incentive_adjustments["structured_reporting"] = {                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  153 â”‚                "base_vwt_reward_multiplier": 1.2,  # 20% increase                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  154 â”‚                "quality_bonus_threshold": 0.85,    # Slightly higher quality requirement                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  155 â”‚                "collaboration_bonus": 30           # Higher collaboration rewards                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  156 â”‚            }                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  157 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  158 â”‚        # Adjust rewards for 3D analytics based on user engagement                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  159 â”‚        if aggregated_patterns["immersive_analytics_engagement"] > 0.7:                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  160 â”‚            incentive_adjustments["immersive_3d_analytics"] = {                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  161 â”‚                "innovation_bonus_multiplier": 1.5,  # 50% increase for innovation                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  162 â”‚                "user_engagement_threshold": 0.8,    # Higher engagement requirement                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  163 â”‚                "performance_bonus": 40               # Reward for render performance                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  164 â”‚            }                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  165 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  166 â”‚        # Apply adjustments to economic governor                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  167 â”‚        await self.economic_governor.apply_incentive_adjustments(incentive_adjustments)                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  168 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  169 â”‚        return IncentiveAdjustment(                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  170 â”‚            adjustments_applied=incentive_adjustments,                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  171 â”‚            expected_impact=self._project_adjustment_impact(incentive_adjustments),                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  172 â”‚            effectiveness_monitoring_plan=self._create_monitoring_plan(incentive_adjustments)                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  173 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **4.2 Treasury Management and Resource Allocation**                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ Economic Resource Optimization:                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    1 â”‚class TreasuryManagementService:                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    2 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    3 â”‚    Manage organizational treasury and resource allocation                                                            â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚    8 â”‚        self.economic_governor = economic_governor                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    9 â”‚        self.resource_allocator = ResourceAllocator()                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   10 â”‚        self.performance_linker = PerformanceCorporateLinker()                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   11 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   12 â”‚    async def allocate_resources_for_capability_enhancement(self,                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   13 â”‚                                                          capability: str,                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   14 â”‚                                                          enhancement_proposal: Dict) -> AllocationResult:            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   15 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   16 â”‚        Allocate treasury resources for capability enhancement                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   17 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   18 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   19 â”‚        # Calculate expected ROI for capability enhancement                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   20 â”‚        roi_projection = await self._calculate_capability_enhancement_roi(                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   21 â”‚            capability, enhancement_proposal                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   22 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   23 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   24 â”‚        # Validate against treasury reserves and corporate performance                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   25 â”‚        treasury_validation = await self._validate_treasury_allocation(                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   26 â”‚            requested_amount=enhancement_proposal.get("budget_requirement"),                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   27 â”‚            projected_roi=roi_projection,                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   28 â”‚            corporate_performance=await self._get_corporate_performance_metrics()                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   29 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   30 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   31 â”‚        if not treasury_validation.is_approved:                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   32 â”‚            return AllocationResult(                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   33 â”‚                approved=False,                                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   34 â”‚                reason=treasury_validation.rejection_reason                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   35 â”‚            )                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   36 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   37 â”‚        # Allocate resources with performance tracking                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   38 â”‚        allocation = ResourceAllocation(                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   39 â”‚            capability=capability,                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   40 â”‚            allocated_budget=treasury_validation.approved_amount,                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   41 â”‚            expected_roi=roi_projection,                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   42 â”‚            performance_milestones=enhancement_proposal.get("milestones", []),                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   43 â”‚            success_metrics=enhancement_proposal.get("success_metrics", {})                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   44 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   45 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   46 â”‚        # Create performance tracking for allocation                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   47 â”‚        await self._setup_performance_tracking(allocation)                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   48 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   49 â”‚        return AllocationResult(                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   50 â”‚            approved=True,                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   51 â”‚            allocation=allocation,                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   52 â”‚            tracking_plan=self._create_tracking_plan(allocation)                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   53 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   54 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   55 â”‚    async def link_agent_performance_to_corporate_outcomes(self,                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   56 â”‚                                                         agent_performance: Dict,                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   57 â”‚                                                         corporate_metrics: Dict) -> PerformanceLinkage:              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   58 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   59 â”‚        Link individual agent performance to corporate financial outcomes                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   60 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   61 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   62 â”‚        linkage_analysis = {}                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   63 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   64 â”‚        for agent_name, performance in agent_performance.items():                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   65 â”‚            # Calculate agent's contribution to corporate metrics                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   66 â”‚            corporate_contribution = self._calculate_corporate_contribution(                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   67 â”‚                agent_performance=performance,                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   68 â”‚                corporate_metrics=corporate_metrics,                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   69 â”‚                agent_capability_category=self._get_agent_capability_category(agent_name)                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   70 â”‚            )                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   71 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   72 â”‚            # Determine economic reward adjustments based on corporate impact                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   73 â”‚            reward_adjustment = self._calculate_reward_adjustment(corporate_contribution)                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   74 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   75 â”‚            linkage_analysis[agent_name] = {                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   76 â”‚                "corporate_contribution": corporate_contribution,                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   77 â”‚                "reward_adjustment": reward_adjustment,                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   78 â”‚                "performance_correlation": self._calculate_performance_correlation(                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   79 â”‚                    performance, corporate_metrics                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   80 â”‚                )                                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   81 â”‚            }                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   82 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   83 â”‚        # Apply corporate-linked rewards                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   84 â”‚        for agent_name, linkage in linkage_analysis.items():                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   85 â”‚            await self.economic_governor.apply_corporate_performance_bonus(                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   86 â”‚                agent_name=agent_name,                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   87 â”‚                bonus_amount=linkage["reward_adjustment"]["bonus_vwt"],                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   88 â”‚                corporate_metrics=corporate_metrics,                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   89 â”‚                contribution_details=linkage["corporate_contribution"]                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   90 â”‚            )                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   91 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   92 â”‚        return PerformanceLinkage(                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   93 â”‚            agent_corporate_links=linkage_analysis,                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   94 â”‚            total_corporate_impact=sum(l["corporate_contribution"]["revenue_impact"]                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   95 â”‚                                     for l in linkage_analysis.values()),                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   96 â”‚            treasury_impact=self._calculate_treasury_impact(linkage_analysis)                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   97 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **Phase 5: Advanced Integration Capabilities**                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **5.1 Event-Driven Architecture Implementation**                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚   65 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚   68 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚   71 â”‚            workflow_id=workflow_id,                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚   78 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   79 â”‚        # Event 2: Handle agent allocation and task distribution                                                      â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚   81 â”‚            "agent_allocation_complete",                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   82 â”‚            workflow_id,                                                                                              â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚   85 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   86 â”‚        # Event 3: Coordinate multi-agent analysis execution                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   87 â”‚        analysis_execution_events = await self._coordinate_multi_agent_execution(                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   88 â”‚            agent_allocation_event, workflow_context                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   89 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   90 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   91 â”‚        # Event 4: Build consensus from agent contributions                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   92 â”‚        consensus_event = await self._build_consensus_from_events(                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   93 â”‚            analysis_execution_events, workflow_context                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   94 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   95 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   96 â”‚        # Event 5: Generate final structured output                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   97 â”‚        final_output_event = await self._generate_final_output(                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   98 â”‚            consensus_event, workflow_context                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   99 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  100 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  101 â”‚        # Event 6: Distribute economic rewards                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  102 â”‚        rewards_event = await self._distribute_economic_rewards(                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  103 â”‚            final_output_event, workflow_context                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  104 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  105 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  106 â”‚        # Event 7: Update DKG with new knowledge and performance data                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  107 â”‚        await self._update_dkg_with_workflow_outcomes(                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  108 â”‚            workflow_context, final_output_event, rewards_event                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  109 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  110 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  111 â”‚        return WorkflowResult(                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  112 â”‚            workflow_id=workflow_id,                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  113 â”‚            final_output=final_output_event.payload,                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  114 â”‚            economic_impact=rewards_event.payload,                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  115 â”‚            performance_metrics=workflow_context.get_performance_metrics(),                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  116 â”‚            dkg_updates=await self._get_dkg_update_summary(workflow_id)                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚  117 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **5.2 Model-as-a-Service (MaaS) Integration**                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ Centralized AI Model Orchestration:                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    1 â”‚class ModelAsAServiceOrchestrator:                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    2 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    3 â”‚    Centralized AI model serving with economic optimization                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    4 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    5 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    6 â”‚    def __init__(self, vertex_ai_client, economic_governor):                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    7 â”‚        self.vertex_ai_client = vertex_ai_client                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    8 â”‚        self.economic_governor = economic_governor                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    9 â”‚        self.model_performance_tracker = ModelPerformanceTracker()                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   10 â”‚        self.cost_optimizer = ModelCostOptimizer()                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   11 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   12 â”‚    async def serve_structured_analysis_model(self, request: AnalysisModelRequest) -> ModelResponse:                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   13 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   14 â”‚        Serve AI model for structured analysis with economic optimization                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   15 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   16 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   17 â”‚        # Determine optimal model based on economic constraints                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   18 â”‚        optimal_model = await self._select_economically_optimal_model(                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   19 â”‚            task_type=request.task_type,                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   20 â”‚            quality_requirements=request.quality_requirements,                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   21 â”‚            cost_constraints=request.cost_constraints,                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   22 â”‚            performance_requirements=request.performance_requirements                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   23 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   24 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   25 â”‚        # Execute model with performance and cost tracking                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   26 â”‚        model_result = await self._execute_model_with_tracking(                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   27 â”‚            model=optimal_model,                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   28 â”‚            request=request,                                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   29 â”‚            economic_context=request.economic_context                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   30 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   31 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   32 â”‚        # Calculate model usage costs and factor into agent rewards                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   33 â”‚        model_costs = self._calculate_model_usage_costs(optimal_model, request)                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   34 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   35 â”‚        # Adjust agent economic context based on model efficiency                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   36 â”‚        efficiency_bonus = self._calculate_model_efficiency_bonus(                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   37 â”‚            model_result, model_costs                                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   38 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   39 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   40 â”‚        return ModelResponse(                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   41 â”‚            result=model_result,                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   42 â”‚            model_used=optimal_model.model_id,                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   43 â”‚            usage_costs=model_costs,                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   44 â”‚            efficiency_bonus=efficiency_bonus,                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   45 â”‚            performance_metrics=model_result.performance_metrics                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   46 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   47 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   48 â”‚    def _select_economically_optimal_model(self, task_type: str,                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   49 â”‚                                         quality_requirements: Dict,                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   50 â”‚                                         cost_constraints: Dict,                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   51 â”‚                                         performance_requirements: Dict) -> AIModel:                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   52 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   53 â”‚        Select AI model optimizing for quality, cost, and performance                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   54 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   55 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   56 â”‚        available_models = self._get_available_models_for_task(task_type)                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   57 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   58 â”‚        model_scores = {}                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   59 â”‚        for model in available_models:                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   60 â”‚            # Calculate economic efficiency score                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   61 â”‚            quality_score = self._assess_model_quality_fit(model, quality_requirements)                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   62 â”‚            cost_score = self._assess_model_cost_efficiency(model, cost_constraints)                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   63 â”‚            performance_score = self._assess_model_performance_fit(model, performance_requirements)                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   64 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   65 â”‚            # Economic optimization function                                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   66 â”‚            economic_score = (                                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   67 â”‚                quality_score * 0.4 +      # 40% weight on quality                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   68 â”‚                cost_score * 0.35 +        # 35% weight on cost efficiency                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   69 â”‚                performance_score * 0.25   # 25% weight on performance                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   70 â”‚            )                                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   71 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   72 â”‚            model_scores[model.model_id] = economic_score                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   73 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   74 â”‚        # Select highest scoring model                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   75 â”‚        optimal_model_id = max(model_scores, key=model_scores.get)                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   76 â”‚        return next(m for m in available_models if m.model_id == optimal_model_id)                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **Phase 6: Comprehensive Capability Enhancement**                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ **6.1 Knowledge Graph-Driven Capability Discovery**                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ Dynamic Capability Evolution:                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚    1 â”‚class CapabilityEvolutionEngine:                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    2 â”‚    """                                                                                                               â”‚ â”‚
