 â”‚ â”‚    5 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    6 â”‚    def __init__(self, dkg_client, economic_governor):                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    7 â”‚        self.dkg_client = dkg_client                                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    8 â”‚        self.economic_governor = economic_governor                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    9 â”‚        self.capability_analyzer = CapabilityAnalyzer()                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   10 â”‚        self.market_intelligence = MarketIntelligenceEngine()                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   11 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   12 â”‚    async def discover_new_capability_opportunities(self) -> List[CapabilityOpportunity]:                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   13 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   14 â”‚        Discover new capability opportunities using DKG analysis and market intelligence                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   15 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   16 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   17 â”‚        # Analyze current capability gaps in DKG                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   18 â”‚        capability_gaps = await self.dkg_client.analyze_capability_gaps()                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   19 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   20 â”‚        # Analyze market demand patterns                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   21 â”‚        market_demand = await self.market_intelligence.analyze_market_demand_patterns()                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   22 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   23 â”‚        # Analyze user request patterns for unmet needs                                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   24 â”‚        unmet_needs = await self._analyze_unmet_user_needs()                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   25 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   26 â”‚        # Generate capability opportunities                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   27 â”‚        opportunities = []                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   28 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   29 â”‚        for gap in capability_gaps:                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   30 â”‚            if self._has_market_demand(gap, market_demand):                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   31 â”‚                opportunity = CapabilityOpportunity(                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   32 â”‚                    capability_name=gap.suggested_capability_name,                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   33 â”‚                    market_demand_score=self._calculate_market_demand_score(gap, market_demand),                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   34 â”‚                    implementation_complexity=gap.estimated_complexity,                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   35 â”‚                    expected_roi=self._project_capability_roi(gap, market_demand),                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   36 â”‚                    required_agent_types=gap.recommended_agent_types,                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   37 â”‚                    estimated_development_time=gap.estimated_development_time                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   38 â”‚                )                                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   39 â”‚                opportunities.append(opportunity)                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   40 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   41 â”‚        # Rank opportunities by economic potential                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   42 â”‚        ranked_opportunities = sorted(                                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   43 â”‚            opportunities,                                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   44 â”‚            key=lambda o: o.expected_roi * o.market_demand_score / o.implementation_complexity,                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   45 â”‚            reverse=True                                                                                              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   46 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   47 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   48 â”‚        return ranked_opportunities                                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   49 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚    8 â”‚        self.economic_governor = economic_governor                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚    9 â”‚        self.performance_validator = performance_validator                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   10 â”‚        self.improvement_engine = ImprovementEngine()                                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   11 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   12 â”‚    async def monthly_optimization_cycle(self) -> OptimizationReport:                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   13 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   14 â”‚        Monthly optimization cycle integrating all platform components                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   15 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   16 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   17 â”‚        optimization_report = OptimizationReport()                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   18 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   19 â”‚        # 1. Collect comprehensive performance data                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   20 â”‚        performance_data = await self._collect_comprehensive_performance_data()                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   21 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   22 â”‚        # 2. Validate economic performance                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   23 â”‚        economic_validation = self.performance_validator.validate_economic_performance(performance_data)              â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   24 â”‚        optimization_report.economic_validation = economic_validation                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   25 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   26 â”‚        # 3. Analyze DKG evolution opportunities                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   27 â”‚        dkg_opportunities = await self.dkg_client.analyze_knowledge_evolution_opportunities()                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   28 â”‚        optimization_report.dkg_opportunities = dkg_opportunities                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   29 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   30 â”‚        # 4. Optimize economic incentive mechanisms                                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   31 â”‚        incentive_optimizations = await self.economic_governor.optimize_incentive_mechanisms(                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   32 â”‚            performance_data=performance_data,                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   33 â”‚            user_behavior_data=await self._get_user_behavior_data()                                                   â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   34 â”‚        )                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   35 â”‚        optimization_report.incentive_optimizations = incentive_optimizations                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   36 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   37 â”‚        # 5. Evolve agent capabilities based on performance                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   38 â”‚        agent_evolution_plan = await self._evolve_agent_capabilities(performance_data)                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   39 â”‚        optimization_report.agent_evolution_plan = agent_evolution_plan                                               â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   40 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   41 â”‚        # 6. Optimize resource allocation                                                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   42 â”‚        resource_optimizations = await self._optimize_resource_allocation(performance_data)                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   43 â”‚        optimization_report.resource_optimizations = resource_optimizations                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   44 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   45 â”‚        # 7. Generate and execute improvement plan                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   46 â”‚        improvement_plan = self.improvement_engine.generate_improvement_plan(optimization_report)                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   47 â”‚        execution_results = await self._execute_improvement_plan(improvement_plan)                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   48 â”‚        optimization_report.improvement_execution = execution_results                                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   49 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   50 â”‚        return optimization_report                                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   51 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   52 â”‚    async def _evolve_agent_capabilities(self, performance_data: Dict) -> AgentEvolutionPlan:                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   53 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   54 â”‚        Evolve agent capabilities based on performance analysis                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   55 â”‚        """                                                                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   56 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   57 â”‚        evolution_plan = AgentEvolutionPlan()                                                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   58 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   59 â”‚        # Analyze individual agent performance                                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   60 â”‚        agent_performances = performance_data.get("agent_performances", {})                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   61 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   62 â”‚        for agent_name, performance in agent_performances.items():                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   63 â”‚            agent_analysis = await self._analyze_agent_evolution_needs(agent_name, performance)                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   64 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   65 â”‚            if agent_analysis.needs_capability_enhancement:                                                           â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   66 â”‚                enhancement = CapabilityEnhancement(                                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   67 â”‚                    agent_name=agent_name,                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   68 â”‚                    current_capabilities=performance.get("current_capabilities", []),                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   69 â”‚                    recommended_enhancements=agent_analysis.recommended_enhancements,                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   70 â”‚                    training_plan=agent_analysis.training_plan,                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   71 â”‚                    expected_performance_improvement=agent_analysis.expected_improvement,                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   72 â”‚                    economic_justification=agent_analysis.economic_justification                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   73 â”‚                )                                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   74 â”‚                evolution_plan.capability_enhancements.append(enhancement)                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   75 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   76 â”‚            if agent_analysis.needs_specialization_refinement:                                                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   77 â”‚                refinement = SpecializationRefinement(                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   78 â”‚                    agent_name=agent_name,                                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   79 â”‚                    current_specialization=performance.get("specialization"),                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   80 â”‚                    recommended_specialization=agent_analysis.optimal_specialization,                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   81 â”‚                    transition_plan=agent_analysis.specialization_transition_plan,                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   82 â”‚                    economic_impact=agent_analysis.specialization_economic_impact                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   83 â”‚                )                                                                                                     â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   84 â”‚                evolution_plan.specialization_refinements.append(refinement)                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   85 â”‚                                                                                                                      â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚   86 â”‚        return evolution_plan                                                                                         â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚                                                                                                                             â”‚ â”‚

 â”‚ â”‚ This enhanced implementation strategy transforms the MAS system into a comprehensive, self-evolving,                        â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ economically-incentivized AI analytics platform that:                                                                       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ âœ… Integrates AAM Architecture for scalable microservices                                                                    â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ âœ… Implements Dynamic Knowledge Graph as the central nervous system                                                          â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ âœ… Establishes Economic Governor with dual-token incentive system                                                            â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ âœ… Enables Sophisticated Governance through conviction voting                                                                â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ âœ… Provides Advanced Capabilities from structured reporting to 3D analytics                                                  â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ âœ… Maintains Economic Alignment between agent performance and corporate outcomes                                             â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ âœ… Ensures Continuous Evolution through performance feedback and market intelligence                                         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ The platform becomes a living, breathing ecosystem where structured report generation is seamlessly integrated with         â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ advanced 3D analytics, real-time collaboration, predictive modeling, and sophisticated economic governance - creating       â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â”‚ unprecedented value for users while maintaining agent motivation and system sustainability.                                 â”‚ â”‚
 â”‚ â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€
